000016.SZ.summary: Konka Group Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, researches, develops, produces, and sells electronic products in China and internationally. It offers televisions, refrigerators, washing machines, personal electronic appliances, and kitchen and bathroom appliances; and home AV, IPTV set-top boxes, OTT terminals, digital TV receivers, digital products, wearable and health products, electric products and switch plugs, power banks, mobile communication equipment and terminal products, daily-use and automotive electronic products, satellite navigation and transportation systems, fire-fighting and security systems, office equipment, computers, displays, and large screen display systems. The company also provides LED back light, illumination, and light-emitting devices; packaging products; Touch TV AIO wireless broadcasting television transiting equipment; and emergency broadcast system equipment, electronic parts and components, molds, plastic and rubber products, packing materials, security and monitoring products, wireless and cable digital television systems and system integration services, and technical consultancy and after-sale paid services. In addition, it engages in the provision of wholesale, retail, import and export, and relevant support services of the aforesaid products; maintenance and technical consultant services for electronic products; ordinary cargo transportation, domestic and international freight forwarding, and warehousing services; management of supply chain; consultancy on enterprise management; self-owned property leasing and management services; and outsourcing services of information technology and business procedures, as well as recovers waste electrical appliances and electronic products. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Konka Electronic Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Konka Group Co., Ltd. in August 1995. Konka Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

000020.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Zhongheng Huafa Co., Ltd. produces and sells injection molded parts, light packaging materials, and LCD whole machines primarily in Central and South China, and Hong Kong. It is also involved in property leasing and management operations. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Huafa Electronics Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Shenzhen Zhongheng Huafa Co., Ltd. in September 2007. Shenzhen Zhongheng Huafa Co., Ltd. was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

000021.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Kaifa Technology Co., Ltd. provides electronics manufacturing services worldwide. The company manufactures computers and storage products, communication products and consumer electronics, semiconductors, medical equipment, automotive electronics, and commercial and industrial products; and provides packaging and testing services for integrated circuits and semiconductors. It also offers research and development, and production services for automation equipment, utility metering systems, and Internet of Things systems. Shenzhen Kaifa Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1985 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

000049.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen Desay Battery Technology Co., Ltd.
000049.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Desay Battery Technology Co., Ltd. operates in lithium battery industry in China and internationally. The company offers small and medium-sized lithium battery packages and mobile power management systems. It serves consumer electronics manufacturers. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Worldsun Enterprise Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shenzhen Desay Battery Technology Co., Ltd. in June 2005. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

000050.SZ.summary: Tianma Microelectronics Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and supplies LCD and LCM products worldwide. Its products include TN-LCD, STN-LCD, TFT-LCD, CF, and LTPS AM-OLED products for various applications, such as mobile phone, tablet PC, PDVD and DPF, DSC and DVC, smart wearable, automotive, and home automation applications, as well as industrial, medical, and monochrome displays. The company was founded in 1983 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

000062.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Huaqiang Industry Co., Ltd. operates as an electronic components distributor in China. The company is also involved in the distribution and supply chain management of integrated circuit, storage, devices, and various passive elements; publishing of electronic components supply and demand information; online transactions; and logistics distribution, financial supply chain, and data study activities. In addition, it develops and manages e-commerce service platform; and trades in electronic products. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

000063.SZ.summary: ZTE Corporation provides integrated telecommunications and information technology (IT) solutions worldwide. It operates through three segments: Carriers' Networks, Government and Corporate Business, and Consumer Business. The company offers wireless products, such as baseband units, AAU series, ultra-broadband radio series, indoor coverage, small cell base station series, and microwave products. It also provides cloud core network products that comprise hardware devices, cloud platform systems; HD voice and video, intelligent pipeline, and user data convergence; CloudStudio GSO, NFVO, and VNFM; and cloud integration products. In addition, the company offers fixed network services, including optical and copper access, and smart home products; transport network, such as optical network, mobile backhaul, router, Ethernet switch, and network control and management systems; multi-media solutions; energy solutions comprise telecom power and data centre; and data management solutions. Further, it provides cloud computing products that include cloud platform, storage, and desktop products; cloud video products, such as video conferencing and IoT platform, contact centre, coalition emergency response systems, and meeting infrastructure; and smart phone and mobile internet products, as well as 5G, consulting and integration, technical, digital operation, intelligent O&M customer support, and learning services. Additionally, the company offers wireless access, cloud core and transport network, fixed access, and AI and bigdata solutions. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.

000066.SZ.long_name: China Greatwall Technology Group Co., Ltd.
000066.SZ.summary: China Greatwall Technology Group Co., Ltd. provides computer components and consumer digital products in China. It also provides PCs/notebooks, tablets, and all-in-one products; power products, such as PC power supply, server power supply, networking power supply, LED power supply, PC adaptor, and power bank products; and servers. The company offers its products for use in infrastructure and solutions, finance, medical care, transportation, education, and other industries. The company was formerly known as China Great Wall Computer Shenzhen Co., Ltd. and changed its name to China Greatwall Technology Group Co., Ltd. in March 2017. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

000068.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Huakong Seg Co., Ltd. does not have significant operations. Previously, the company was involved in the design, manufacture, and sale of electronic components. Shenzhen Huakong Seg Co., Ltd. is based in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.

000413.SZ.summary: Tunghsu Optoelectronic Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the development and sale of liquid crystal glass substrates and equipment in China. It also offers energy buses, and single-layer graphene and graphene-based lithium-ion battery related products; and purchases and sells memory chip products, peripherals and e-sports main computers, LCD screen modules, and whole machine products. In addition, the company is involved in the development and sale of real estate properties. The company was formerly known as Shijiazhuang Baoshi Electronic Glass Co., Ltd. Tunghsu Optoelectronic Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Shijiazhuang, China.

000521.SZ.summary: Changhong Meiling Company Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells electrical appliances in China. It also researches, develops, manufactures, and sells low temperature freezerand refrigeration, air-conditioners, kitchen and toilet products, home appliances, water purifier, and washing machines, as well as sells white goods. In addition, the company engages in the sale of prepackaged food, dairy products, general merchandise, alcohol, beverage, agricultural and crop planting products; imports and exports technology and self-support goods; develops and maintains e-commerce software; and offers technology development, information, technical transfer, Internet, domestic ad designing, production, and agency services. Further, it is involved in e-business of agricultural products; after sale services of washing machines; and produces and sells of Internet of Things equipment's, and computer hardware and software. The company offers its products through various channels, such as chains, wholesale, e-commerce, and others, as well as exports its products to approximately 130 countries and regions. The company was formerly known as Hefei Meiling Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Changhong Meiling Company Co., Ltd. in July 2018. Changhong Meiling Company Co., Ltd. is based in Hefei, China.

000547.SZ.summary: Addsino Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the military and civilian integration business in China. It offers electronic blue army plate products, such as microwave darkroom testing, electromagnetic environment monitoring, passive radar calibration, simulated radar, and target simulator systems; and alleged communication sections, including network equipment, wireless devices, and wired equipment. The company also provides simulation and equipment information solutions comprising parachute training simulators, heavy vehicle simulators, digital earth solutions, and joint combat simulation deduction platforms; and electromagnetic protection and lightning protection grounding products, such as electromagnetic information security and protection equipment. In addition, it offers rail transit and automotive electronics consisting of motor controller, dual main gas engine management system, lithium battery management systems, vehicle controllers, and AFC system integration solutions; and power equipment, such as SG224 brushless three-phase synchronous generators, multi-machine parallel series diesel generator sets, automotive power station series, trailer type mobile power station series, low noise series diesel generator sets, and basic series generator sets. The company was formerly known as ChinaScholars Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Addsino Co., Ltd. in August 2015. Addsino Co., Ltd. was founded in 1955 and is based in Beijing, China.

000586.SZ.long_name: Sichuan Huiyuan Optical Communication Co., Ltd.
000586.SZ.summary: Sichuan Huiyuan Optical Communication Co., Ltd. produces and sells optical fiber cables in China. It provides common cables, ribbon cables, micro optical fiber cables, electrical optical fiber cables, and exchange entrance cables. The company is also engages in the system integration, software research and development, digital science technology, engineering design, and import-export businesses. It offers its products for use in the main trunk lines communication, LAN communication, broadcasting and television, army, electric power, traffic, and railway and petroleum applications. Sichuan Huiyuan Optical Communication Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Chengdu, the People's Republic of China.

000591.SZ.summary: CECEP Solar Energy Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, construction, and operation of photovoltaic power plants. It engages in the technology research and development, manufacture, and sale of monocrystalline silicon products, and polycrystalline silicon battery and components. The company also generates and sells solar energy; invests in, constructs, operates, maintains, and manages solar energy generation projects; provides solar energy generation planning, technology research and development, design consultation, integration, installation, and operation maintenance services; and other related business, as well as manufactures generating system devices. In addition, it provides electricity solution to production; and living electricity facilities for families, villages, hospitals, border posts, islands, and others. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Beijing, China. CECEP Solar Energy Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of China Energy Conservation and Environmental Protection Group.

000606.SZ.summary: Shunliban Information Service Co.,Ltd engages in the enterprise Internet service business in China. It provides enterprise registration, finance and taxation, intellectual property, investment and financing, and problem solving services in the process of enterprise development. The company also provides modern enterprise services, such as standard and customized advisory services; and user services, professional service factory, cooperative services, service station outlets, and offline service support systems. In addition, it operates online service platform that provides knowledge, application, e-commerce, service, resource, and data cloud services combined with offline service system, as well as open cloud and cloud computing services; and provides smart enterprise services, such as enterprise insurance, procurement, and marketing, as well as service insurance and corporate finance services. The company was formerly known as Shenzhou Yiqiao Information Service Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shunliban Information Service Co.,Ltd in June 2018. Shunliban Information Service Co.,Ltd was founded in 1996 and is based in Beijing, China.

000611.SZ.long_name: Inner Mongolia TianShou Technology&development, CO., LTD.
000611.SZ.summary: Inner Mongolia TianShou Technology&development, CO., LTD. manufactures and distributes textile products, testing instruments, caustic soda, and other products. It is also involved in the retailing business and related trading activities; and plant leasing business. The company was formerly known as The Inner Mongolia Sihai Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Inner Mongolia TianShou Technology&development, CO., LTD. in June 2016. Inner Mongolia TianShou Technology&development, CO., LTD. is based in Beijing, China.

000636.SZ.long_name: Guangdong Fenghua Advanced Technology (Holding) Co., Ltd.
000636.SZ.summary: Guangdong Fenghua Advanced Technology (Holding) Co., Ltd. produces and sells electronic components and materials, special electronic equipment, and other basic electronic information products. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Zhaoqing, China.

000651.SZ.long_name: Gree Electric Appliances, Inc. of Zhuhai
000651.SZ.summary: Gree Electric Appliances, Inc. of Zhuhai produces and sells household appliances worldwide. The company offers residential air conditioners (ACs), including wall-mounted, floor-standing, window, portable, dehumidifier, and special ACs; commercial ACs, such as light commercial, multi-VRF, chiller, terminal, packaged unit, and special ACs; and air to water heat pumps comprising residential and commercial water heaters, and multi-functional heat pumps. It also provides home appliances that include electric fans and heaters, water dispensers and purifiers, humidifiers, multi-cookers, air purifiers, electric kettles, pressure and induction cookers; side by side, Italian type, multi-door, three door, combi, double door, single door, and chest freezer refrigerators; and smartphone, industrial, compressor, motor, enameled wires, intelligent equipment, machine tools, and precision molding products and castings equipment. The company serves the public, financial and communication, office, real estate, shopping center, hotel, and industrial sectors. The company was formerly known as Haili Air-conditioning Engineering Co., Ltd. of Zhuhai and changed its name to Gree Electric Appliances, Inc. of Zhuhai in 1994. Gree Electric Appliances, Inc. of Zhuhai was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Zhuhai, China.

000669.SZ.summary: Jinhong Holding Group Co., Ltd. develops, constructs, and manages natural gas pipeline networks. It distributes natural and urban gas to residential, business, and industrial users. The company also engages in the investment and operation of vehicle gas stations. In addition, it provides environmental protection engineering services, including the research, development, and application of air pollution control environmental protection technologies and products, engineering construction, and project operation. The company was formerly known as PetroChina Jinhong Energy Investment Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Jinhong Holding Group Co., Ltd. in September 2017. Jinhong Holding Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1985 and is based in Beijing, China.

000676.SZ.summary: Genimous Technology Co., Ltd. engages in Internet media and digital marketing businesses in China and internationally. It offers mobile advertising trading platform; and integrated digital marketing, media strategy, communication strategy, media buying, socialized marketing, search engine marketing, traffic docking, and entertainment marketing services. The company also develops App China, a local android-based application store, which connects users with developers; and cross-platform solutions that connects advertisers and software developers. In addition, it engages in Internet games and Internet finance businesses. The company was formerly known as Genimous Investment Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Genimous Technology Co., Ltd. in August 2016. Genimous Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is based in Beijing, China.

000701.SZ.summary: Xiamen Xindeco Ltd. engages in the electronic information, automobile distribution, and supply chain businesses in China and internationally. It produces a range of in-line LED, SMD LED, high power white LED, LED road lighting, LED tunnel lighting, LED indoor lighting, LED traffic display, LED display, and other products. The company is also involved in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of RFID products; and provision of supply chain services to the non-ferrous and ferrous metal industries. In addition, it provides car dealership services; and real estate services. The company was founded in 1984 and is based in Xiamen, China.

000727.SZ.summary: Nanjing Huadong Electronics Information & Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells flat panel displays, touch displays, quartz crystals, magnetic materials, and power supply products in China and internationally. Its products include TFT-LCD, touch screen, and LCD and display module products; crystal resonators, oscillators, filters, and other components; and magnetic power, magnetic core, power supply, and other components. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Nanjing, China. Nanjing Huadong Electronics Information & Technology Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of China Electronics Corporation.

000733.SZ.long_name: China Zhenhua (Group) Science & Technology Co., Ltd
000733.SZ.summary: China Zhenhua (Group) Science & Technology Co., Ltd produces and sells electronic components in China. It operates through three segments: New Electronic Components, Dedicated Complete Machines and Systems, and Modern Services. The company offers chip tantalum capacitors, chip resistors, chip inductors, chip diodes, transistors, and thick film hybrid integrated circuits, as well as switches, miniature relays, contactors, semiconductor discrete devices, high voltage vacuum interrupters, and Li-ion power battery products. It also provides complete communication machines for mobile communication terminal products; integrated circuits and components of lithium ion batteries; and high voltage vacuum switching tubes. In addition, the company engages in power supply and property leasing businesses. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Guiyang, China.

000801.SZ.summary: Sichuan Jiuzhou Electronic Co., Ltd., an electronic information technology company, researches, develops, produces, and sells digital TV set-top boxes, digital satellite TV equipment, digital cable TV front-ends, and broadband network equipment. It has operations in China, North America, South America, Western Europe, the Middle East, and internationally. The company is headquartered in Mianyang, China. Sichuan Jiuzhou Electronic Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Sichuan Jiuzhou Electric Group Co., Ltd.

000810.SZ.summary: Skyworth Digital Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells digital TV products worldwide. The company provides set top boxes for broadcasting, android TV, and RDK platform; broadband CPE for GPON ONT, routers, and LTE and PLC products; and smart home products. It also operates video operation support system, an online software platform that support operator to streamline and simplify their video operation; and end-to-end systems integration services. Skyworth Digital Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

000823.SZ.summary: Guangdong Goworld Co., Ltd. offers ultrasonic electronic components and electronic equipment in China and internationally. The company provides non-destructive testing instruments, printed circuit boards, liquid crystal display and touch devices, copper clad laminates, and ultrasonic flaw detectors. Its products are used in communication products, network products, computers, industrial control equipment, mobile communications mobile phones, instruments and meters. The company also exports its products to the United States, European Union, Australia, Japan, Hong Kong, and other countries. Guangdong Goworld Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Shantou, China.

000829.SZ.summary: Telling Telecommunication Holding Co.,Ltd engages in the distribution of mobile phones in China. The company distributes its products through online and offline channels. It also sells lottery products in the fields of welfare and sports; provides mobile communication and Internet services; operates an e-commerce platform for mobile phone distribution; and offers wine and liquor products. The company was formerly known as Jiangxi Gannan Fruits Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Telling Telecommunication Holding Co.,Ltd in March 2007. Telling Telecommunication Holding Co.,Ltd was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

000836.SZ.long_name: Tianjin Futong Information Science and Technology Co., Ltd.
000836.SZ.summary: Tianjin Futong Information Science and Technology Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and supplies optical communication products in China. The company primarily offers optical fiber preforms, optical fibers, and optical cables for national information network construction, backbone information networks, metropolitan area networks, access networks, base stations, indoor distribution, etc. It also researches, designs, develops, and manufactures quartz materials and products, including large optical fiber preform bushing tubes under independent intellectual property rights. The company was formerly known as TIANJIN FUTONG XINMAO SCIENCE&TECHNOLOGY CO.,Ltd. and changed its name to Tianjin Futong Information Science and Technology Co., Ltd. in January 2020. Tianjin Futong Information Science and Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Tianjin, China.

000851.SZ.long_name: Gohigh Data Networks Technology Co., Ltd
000851.SZ.summary: Gohigh Data Networks Technology Co., Ltd provides IP communication products in China. The company offers Internet of Things, converged communication, and enterprise information products. It provides its products and services to call center markets, such as government, telecommunication, broadcasting, and other industries. The company also offers mobile Internet and Internet supporting services to independent consumer groups. Gohigh Data Networks Technology Co., Ltd is based in Beijing, China.

000889.SZ.summary: ZJBC Information Technology Co., Ltd, through its subsidiaries, primarily provides information intelligent transmission services in China. The company also offers communication network maintenance services, such as operation management, fault repair, and routine maintenance for network resources owned by communication operators and tower companies. In addition, it provides business process outsourcing services for financial institutions, including banks. The company was formerly known as Maoye Communication and Network Co., Ltd. ZJBC Information Technology Co., Ltd was founded in 1997 and is based in Qinhuangdao, China.

000909.SZ.summary: Soyea Technology Co., Ltd. provides digital electronic information and communication products in China. The company offers DPTV digital processing color television (TV), high-definition (HD) LCD TV, and HD TV set-top box products; digital multimedia information release, electric vehicle power battery, intelligent traffic broadcast control, intelligent building access security, and smart grid monitoring systems; and Internet of Things, Internet of vehicles, and other industrial products. It is also involved in energy, real estate, and software park construction businesses. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

000925.SZ.summary: UniTTEC Co., Ltd. provides integrated solutions in the areas of rail transit, and energy saving and environmental protection in China. The company offers signaling systems, including DTO/UTO, tram, monorail/sky rail, and suburban railway signaling system solutions for urban rail transit; and computer-based interlocking and inter-city high speed train automatic operation systems for mail line railways, as well as intelligent control and dispatching optimization systems for heavy haul trains. It also provides automatic fare collection systems (AFC) and AFC system equipment; and rail transit intellectualization systems, such as CRH carriage video monitoring systems, train bogie monitoring systems, axial temperature sensors, and online monitoring and early warning systems. In addition, the company offers heavy metal pollution prevention, control, and treatment; dyeing wastewater treatment; advanced treatment; zero liquid discharge and reuse; petrochemical field; and comprehensive treatment of regional environment systems for water treatment. Further, it provides smart lighting solutions; and manufactures semiconductor materials comprising monocrystalline silicon material. The company was formerly known as United Science and Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to UniTTEC Co., Ltd. in March 2017. UniTTEC Co., Ltd. is based in Hangzhou, China.

000938.SZ.summary: Unisplendour Corporation Limited, a technology company, provides electronics and information technology (IT) solutions in China and internationally. The company offers cloud computing, mobile Internet, big data processing, and other services for IT applications; and research and development, building, operation, and maintenance of information systems. It also provides equipment, such as intelligent network equipment, storage systems, and servers; desktop and mobile software solutions; and technical consulting, infrastructure solutions, and support services. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Beijing, China.

000948.SZ.summary: Yunnan Nantian Electronics Information Co.,Ltd., an IT company, provides hardware and software products and solutions to banking/financial industry in China. It offers dot matrix printers; card readers, information interactive terminals, camera scanners, and other smart banking solutions; ribbon cartridges; mobile banking tablets, video teller machines, cashless ATMs, kiosk modules, card dispenser kiosks, and other self-services kiosks; thermal printers and modules; and spare parts. The company also provides data center services and integrated solutions; payment products and solutions to telecom operators, third-party payment providers, and financial institutions; software development and system integration services in the areas of utilities, water reservation system, telecommunications, scientific studies, government, authorities, and national defense; and consultancy and outsourcing services. Yunnan Nantian Electronics Information Co.,Ltd. is headquartered in Kunming, China.

000971.SZ.summary: Gosun Holding Co., Ltd. provides integrated cloud infrastructure solutions and services for the government and enterprise industries, and Internet customers in China and internationally. It offers Internet data center services, static Website acceleration services, download acceleration services, streaming acceleration services, cloud assessment, cloud monitoring, and cloud acceleration services. The company also provides online game, online software, and online video industry solutions, as well as e-commerce Website solutions. It serves various customers, including finance, insurance, radio and television, Internet service providers, electricity providers, portals, streaming media, cloud computing, and government agencies. The company was formerly known as Hubei Landing Holding Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Gosun Holding Co., Ltd. in November 2015. Gosun Holding Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

000977.SZ.long_name: Inspur Electronic Information Industry Co., Ltd.
000977.SZ.summary: Inspur Electronic Information Industry Co., Ltd. provides data center and cloud computing solutions worldwide. The company offers rack, multi-node, and rack-scale servers; and artificial intelligence, cloud, SAP HANA platform, and hyperconverged infrastructure solutions. It also provides product and technical support services. The company serves government and enterprise customers. Inspur Electronic Information Industry Co., Ltd. is headquartered in Jinan, China.

000997.SZ.summary: Newland Digital Technology Co.,Ltd. provides bar code, financial payment, mobile and other communications, traffic information, and Internet finance services in China and internationally. The company offers bar code recognition technology; POS machines for electronic financial payment; mobile information technology; cloud computing and big data services; traffic information business software, equipment, and systems service solutions; and online to offline QR code marketing services. It also provides system construction and operation services of intelligent transportation solutions; develops, constructs, and operates expressways electromechanical information; constructs and operates car networking systems; rail transit electromechanical information; develops and constructs intelligent parking lots; and designs and constructs provincial and municipal intelligent traffic card application planning and technical standards. In addition, the company offers software development, hardware manufacturing, and system integration services in the field of food safety; animal identification and disease traceability systems for the Department of Agriculture; meat and vegetable circulation traceability systems to the Ministry of Commerce; national veterinary drug product traceability information systems; Chinese medicine tracing systems for the Ministry of Commerce; and construction services for Beijing Olympic food safety project. Further, it provides consumer, small and micro-operating, and online merchant micro-loans. The company was formerly known as Fujian Newland Computer Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Newland Digital Technology Co.,Ltd. in November 2018. Newland Digital Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Fuzhou, China.

002017.SZ.summary: Eastcompeace Technology Co.,ltd provides smart card and system solutions in China and internationally. It offers smart cards, inducing TurboCOS, USIMExploiter, USIMExploiter Plus, M2M, SWP NFC, SIMePay, micro SIM and nano SIM, scratch, mag-stripe, EMV IC, contactless, dual interface, national ID, citizen, transportation, and social security cards. The company also provides SIM-key, SIM-kiosk, device management system, smart tracking system, OTA, TSM, key management system, banking card Perso, mobile payment system, one card, and smart parking management system solutions. It serves clients in telecommunications, banking and payment, IOT, and government and public sectors. The company was formerly known as Eastcompeace Smart Card Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Eastcompeace Technology Co.,ltd in April 2012. Eastcompeace Technology Co.,ltd was founded in 1998 and is based in Zhuhai, China.

002036.SZ.summary: LianChuang Electronic Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of touch glasses, display modules, and optics for mobile communication and computers in China and internationally. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Nanchang, china.

002045.SZ.summary: Guoguang Electric Company Limited develops, manufactures, and sells speaker drivers and audio systems in the People's Republic of China and internationally. Its speaker drivers are used in telephones, TV sets, home theatres, Hi-Fi sound systems, computers, automobiles, broadcasting products, professional studio monitors, and other professional applications. The company also provides public address speakers, studio monitors, commercial sound systems, and custom install sound products for the residential market; wireless active speaker systems; speakers for use in business level desktop phones; and speakers and speaker systems for use in laptop and desktop computers. Guoguang Electric Company Limited was founded in 1951 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, the People's Republic of China.

002049.SZ.summary: Unigroup Guoxin Microelectronics Co., Ltd. designs and develops integrated circuit (IC) chip in China. It also provides system integration solutions. The company offers intelligent secure chip for telecommunication SIM card, financial IC card, mobile payment card, USB-Key, social security card, citizen card, residential health card, residence permit and trusted computing TPM, non-contact read-write machine, etc.; memory chips; and quartz crystal components and sapphire substrate materials. The company was formerly known as Unigroup Guoxin Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Unigroup Guoxin Microelectronics Co., Ltd. in June 2018. Unigroup Guoxin Microelectronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1990 and is based in Tangshan, China.

002052.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Coship Electronics Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of smart home solutions and services worldwide. The company offers terminal products, middleware products, smart platform products, and operation business products and other products and services. Its products include DVB products comprising ultra-HD (4K) set-top boxes, HEVC HD STB series video compression and security CA systems, and H.264 SD and HD STB video compression products; IPTV HD STB series products; and Android OTT boxes, HDMI dongles, OTT+IPTV boxes, OTT+Terrestrial boxes, OTT+Cable hybrid boxes, and OTT+Satellite boxes. The company's products also consist of broadband products, such as VDSL integrated access devices, EoC coaxial Ethernet systems, cable modem series products, and wireless residential gateways; LED back light source digital cable TVs; and natural TVs. Shenzhen Coship Electronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002055.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Deren Electronic Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of connectors and precision components for the home appliance, consumer and automotive electronics, and telematics technology sectors. It offers MFI, FPC, and FFC products, as well as LED supports, LED optical lens, camera lens, wiring harnesses, and connectors for the home appliance and consumer products industry; lighting, connection, and electric systems, as well as automotive electronics and NEV technology products for the automotive electronics and electrics industry; and various telematics industry solutions. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.

002056.SZ.summary: Hengdian Group DMEGC Magnetics Co., Ltd manufactures and sells hard ferrite magnets and ferrite cores in China, the European Union, the United States, Japan, South America, Southeast Asia, and internationally. It offers ferrite magnet products, including ring, segment, microwave oven, square, and isotropic magnets; ferrite cores comprising Mn-Zn ferrite power, Ni-Zn ferrite, Mn-Zn high permeability ferrite, iron powder, and magnetic powder cores; and NdFeB magnets, such as bonded square, segment, and ring magnets. The company also provides motor housing and assembly products consisting of seamless steel tube cutting, rolling steel, and deep drawn motor housings; sintered powder for hard ferrite magnet and bonded powder for hard ferrite; solar cells and modules; and alkaline Zn-Mn dry batteries. In addition, it offers purifying home appliances, such as water and air purifiers; and hard alloy products, such as tungsten powder, carbonized tungsten powder, mold and anisotropic hard alloys, and mining tools, as well as anvil and compound sheet products. Further, the company provides EV/EB and power tool series cells; and battery packs for electric vehicles, small automotive battery systems, and battery pack for power tools. Additionally, it provides flexible copper clad laminates, including polyimide FCCL and polyimide cladding; and rare earth materials, such as fluorescent level europium, terbium, dysprosium, lanthanum, praseodymium-neodymium, and other oxide products. The company also invests in, develops, constructs, and operates solar grid-connected and BIPV projects; operates a tourism business hotel; and engages in international trade activities. Its products are used in the electronic appliance, automotive, communication, and other markets. The company was founded in 1980 and is based in Dongyang, China.

002057.SZ.summary: Sinosteel Anhui Tianyuan Technology Co.,Ltd. produces and sells ferrite magnetic materials, and magnetic separation and crushing equipment in China and internationally. It offers ferrite magnet for automobile motors, household appliance motors, and DC permanent magnet motors; neodymium magnets, including sintered NdFeB magnets and multi-poles ring magnets; and manganous-manganic oxide. The company also provides permanent wet drum magnetic separators, drum permanent magnetic separators, multi-poles rising magnetic separators, dry permanent magnetic separators, roll type high intensity permanent magnetic separators, and permanent magnetic dehydration tanks. In addition, it offers high press grinding rollers, metal tower mills, and advanced frontier material, as well as physical and chemical analysis, and driving technical reform and product upgrading services. Sinosteel Anhui Tianyuan Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Ma'anshan, China.

002063.SZ.summary: YGSOFT Inc. provides enterprise management and social service information systems to the energy industry. The company also offers software and hardware products and services, and financial, information and big data analytics consulting service. In addition, the company provides power distribution network information services, energy management, energy information application, fuel solutions, and analytical equipment and solutions, as well as coal quality technology. Further, it offers Internet solutions; management tools for military industry; business extension platform; project management solutions; business travel management solutions; and invests in and finances business development platform. Additionally, the company provides various management field solutions in the fields of business analysis, governance, risk and compliance, financial management, purchase and sale of electricity, financial sharing, safety production management, consolidated statement, cost management, EAP integration, electronic file management, accounting, asset management, SME, material management, consultation, system integration, and wisdom check. It serves customers in energy, aerospace, high-end equipment, metallurgical smelting, and rail transportation industries. Ygsoft Inc. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Zhuhai, China.

002090.SZ.summary: Wiscom System Co., Ltd. engages in smart energy and smart city businesses in China. The company researches and develops, manufactures, and sells power generation, transmission, substation, distribution, and other power automation products. It is also involved in the wind power, solar energy, and other new energy power generation; biomass and waste heat power generation; distributed gas turbine and other thermal power generation; and power distribution professional engineering consulting, survey, and design businesses. In addition, the company engages in the new energy, micro-network, energy emission reduction, and other project development, construction management, and general contracting businesses; and other technology development and technical services businesses. Further, it provides IT consulting, value-added, and infrastructure, as well as industry application solutions. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Nanjing, China.

002093.SZ.summary: Guomai Technologies, Inc. provides telecommunications outsourcing services in China. The company offers network operation and maintenance services, including network health checks, routine maintenance technical support, network monitoring, network quality analysis and evaluation, network adjustment optimization and upgrade, network construction and rectification, network signal distribution and coverage, network equipment maintenance, spare parts, update and emergency communications support, data storage backup and analysis, traffic model statistical analysis, and other services. It also provides design consulting services, such as telecom market research, business development strategy, network status analysis, business needs analysis, network development planning, network evolution strategy, network engineering survey and design, and investment and benefit assessment services, as well as 2G/3G mobile core network, wireless network, IP bearer network, optical transmission network, and IT systems services. In addition, the company offers business process and human resource outsourcing services. Further, it provides telecom network integration services comprising network integration, integrated supervision, renewal, network generation and optimization, technical support, application development, channel construction, brand promotion, and certification training services. Additionally, the company offers education and training services consisting of telecom business operations, project management, technical, certification, and other training services. Guomai Technologies, Inc. was founded in 1996 and is based in Fuzhou, China.

002095.SZ.summary: Zhejiang NetSun Co., Ltd. provides Internet information, e-commerce, and enterprise application software development services in China. It operates Websites, such as chemnet.com.cn, chinachemnet.com, texnet.com.cn, pharmnet.com.cn, toocle.cn, toocle.com, 100ppi.com, dazpin.com, sinopay.com, and sinoloans.cn. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

002104.SZ.summary: Hengbao Co.,Ltd. provides smart products and solutions in China and internationally. The company offers fiscard, e-bank security, WAP security, payment, and platform solutions for banking industry; mobile communication, platform, and mobile payment solutions for telecommunication industry; and social insurance, residents health card, citizen card, and tax control solutions for government sector. It also provides city I pass, ETC card, and transportation permit solutions for the transportation industry; and enterprise I pass, campus I pass, magnetic cards, and IOT products for various industrial applications. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

002106.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Laibao Hi-Tech Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of flat panel display upstream materials and touch devices in China. Its principal products include capacitive touch screens, ITO conductive glasses, color filters, and TFT-LCD panels. The company provides its products for use in smart phones, tablet computers, touch notebook computers, and integrated computers, as well as in automotive instrumentation, medical, and industrial control panel applications. Shenzhen Laibao Hi-Tech Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002112.SZ.long_name: SAN BIAN SCIENCE& TECHNOLOGY Co., LTD.
002112.SZ.summary: SAN BIAN SCIENCE& TECHNOLOGY Co., LTD. produces and sells large and medium size transformers in China and internationally. Its principal products include oil immersed power transformers, dry-type transformers, transformers for petrifaction, combined transformers, amorphous alloy transformers, combined transformer substations, low voltage cable branch boxes and distribution equipment, special transformers, and others. The company was founded in 1968 and is based in Taizhou, China.

002115.SZ.summary: Sunwave Communications Co.Ltd develops and manufactures IP based wireless infrastructure technologies for mobile network operators worldwide. Its products include CrossFire DAS platform, the Access Unit, the Low Power Remote Unit, the High Power Remote Unit, the Nano Power Remote Unit, the Expansion Unit, Thin RAN, and Small Cell, as well as passive components, including filters, splitters, combiners, and duplexors. Sunwave Communications Co.Ltd is based in Hangzhou, China.

002119.SZ.summary: Ningbo Kangqiang Electronics Co., Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, develops, produces, and sells various semiconductor packaging materials in China. It offers stamping frameworks, etching frames, bonding wires, and LED frameworks, as well as wire electrodes, production frameworks, and other products. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Ningbo, China.

002123.SZ.long_name: Montnets Cloud Technology Group Co., Ltd.
002123.SZ.summary: Montnets Cloud Technology Group Co., Ltd. operates as a mobile Internet operating support service provider in China and internationally. It operates operations support platform for various B2C applications of mobile Internet, as well as offers mobile instant messaging services, such as SMS and MMS for enterprises. The company also provides mobile smart traffic services; and operates an audio/video communication service cloud platform enabling enterprises to implement communication capabilities based on mobile Internet audio and video platform. In addition, it offers B2C unified communication cloud platform, a PaaS platform to help corporate customers obtain the B2C communication service capability; enterprise mobile platform, a communication gateway system for front-end access; and short message captcha for member verification, order notification, payment confirmation, logistics notification, and other triggering SMS applications. Further, the company provides mobile information code application platform; SMS notification; enterprise yellow page; Nova information processing platform for corporate customers; Tongzhiwang, a software product with notification; and audio captcha services. Additionally, it offers Montnets video cloud, a real-time communication platform; Montnets Cloud Broadcast, a vertical SaaS product; wisdom IoT cloud platform; and IoT 4G/3G/2G cards. The company was formerly known as Montnets Rongxin Technology Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Montnets Cloud Technology Group Co., Ltd. in November 2020. Montnets Cloud Technology Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002129.SZ.summary: Tianjin Zhonghuan Semiconductor Co., Ltd. provides semiconductor materials and devices, and new energy materials in China and internationally. The company offers solar energy materials, including solar mono-crystalline silicon rods, wafers, and materials, as well as solar polycrystalline silicon materials; solar products, such as mono-crystalline silicon solar cells; and photovoltaic power stations. It also provides semiconductor materials comprising etching, polished, float-zone mono-crystalline silicon, and czochralski mono-crystalline silicon wafers. In addition, the company offers semiconductor devices consisting of TVS protective, HV, bridge, and schottky diodes, as well as GPP chips and metal-oxide-semiconductor field-effect transistors. Its products are used in smart grid transmission, new energy vehicle, high-speed rail, wind power inverters, integrated circuits, consumer electronics, aerospace, solar power generation, etc. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Tianjin, China.

002134.SZ.summary: Tianjin Printronics Circuit Corporation manufactures, sells, and exports PCBs in the People's Republic of China and internationally. Its products include 1 step HDIs, 2-step HDIs, step HDIs with fine pitch, 16 layer boards, military high layer boards, power supply boards, normal boards, 10 layer rigid flex boards, rigid flex boards, 1-side 2-layer aluminum boards, and via in pads. The company's products are used in various fields, such as industrial automation control, telecommunication, aviation and aerospace, automotive electronics, IT, instrument and meters, medical devices, and consumer electronics. Tianjin Printronics Circuit Corporation was founded in 1988 and is based in Tianjin, the People's Republic of China.

002138.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Sunlord Electronics Co.,Ltd. operates as a technology developer for the passive component industry worldwide. It offers planar electronic and wire wound electronic transformers; coils/inductors, such as metal alloy multilayer chip power inductor/MPM, wire wound SMD power inductors/WPL series, wire wound SMD power inductors/WPN series; fine ceramic products, including zirconia fingerprint identification sensor covers and zirconia back covers; and customized components comprises wireless charging coil assemblies, NFC products, through-hole boards, and HDI boards. The company also provides chip temperature sensing NTC thermistors and sensors, and chip polymer PTC thermistors; EMC components consisting of multilayer chip ferrite beads, wire wound chip ferrite beads, chip 3-terminal filters, and common mode filters; circuit protection components, including multilayer varistors, glass ceramic ESD suppressors, and leaded varistors for voltage surge suppressions; RF components; and solid tantalum chip capacitors and solid niobium oxide chip capacitors. Its products applications include energy, computer, consumer products, communications, and automotive electronics, as well as switching power applications. Shenzhen Sunlord Electronics Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002139.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Topband Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells intelligent control system solutions worldwide. The company provides diversified customized solutions for home appliances, tools, industry, and new energy applications. It also offers customized product concepts, design, development, manufacturing, and delivery services for master and power control, motor drive and control, and display control of home appliances; and for electronic controls, motors and batteries, and product forms that comprise controllers, modules, and complete machines. In addition, the company provides products and system solutions, such as battery cells, battery management and control, battery packs, and charging cabinets for communication base station energy storage, home energy storage, power batteries for two- or three- wheeled vehicles and other special vehicles, mobile charging power, and IoT applications. Further, it offers step and servo drives, and control products; and controllers, drivers, and motors used in 3C electronics, robotics, medical and semiconductor equipment, textile and packaging machinery, etc. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

002151.SZ.summary: Beijing BDStar Navigation Co., Ltd. provides satellite navigation, and positioning products and services worldwide. asic products, automotive electronics, special application, and industry applications & operational services. The company provides high precision and navigation products, such as GNSS SoC chips, modules, and boards; GNSS antennas, including survey, choke ring, aviation, Helix/UAV, beacon, smart, and OEM antennas, as well as H-RTK GNSS modules; and wireless data links comprising OEM modems, external radios, and accessories. It also offers iridium antennas; mobile base station antennas, including regular base station and integrative concealment antennas; and RF passive components comprising low and high temperature co-fired, and microwave dielectric ceramics; and soft magnetism ferrite materials. In addition, the company provides passive, active, monopole/dipole, and special antennas; GNSS, CATV, Bluetooth, and WIFI modules; and ceramic substrates comprising LTCC, HTCC, and composite substrates. Further, it offers automotive electronic products, such as infotainment system, reconfigurable instrument cluster, heads-up display, and T-BOX; and automotive engineering services, including automotive electronics testing and verification engineering, and software development services, as well as services for driving assistance, infotainment, and related systems. The company's products are used in various applications, such as measuring, mapping, mechanical control, vehicle monitoring, automotive electronics, precision agriculture, aero logical sounding, precision timing, etc. Beijing BDStar Navigation Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

002153.SZ.long_name: Beijing Shiji Information Technology Co., Ltd.
002153.SZ.summary: Beijing Shiji Information Technology Co., Ltd. provides software solutions and services for the hospitality, food service, retail, and entertainment industries in China and internationally. It also offers payment gateways; data management solutions; IT services for restaurants; POS hardware, kitchen printers, and screens; inventory management software for restaurants; and e-commerce platforms for stores, products, orders, purchasing, delivery, maintenance, storage, finance, loyalty programs, and reporting. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

002156.SZ.summary: Tongfu Microelectronics Co.,Ltd provides integrated circuit (IC) assembling and testing services to the semiconductor industry worldwide. It provides wafer-level, flip chip, flip chip interconnection, ball grid array, plastic qual flat no-lead and dual flat no-lead, small outline, small outline transistor, dual-in-line, transistor outline, and plastic single-in-line packaging series products. The company's products are used in AP/PA/BB/RFIC chips, wireless LAN, card, switch, power management, memory, and standard analog, etc.; package solution for applications in computing, gaming, and high bandwidth networking/communication devices; networking, memory, microprocessors, graphic processors, logic, and micro-controllers; and consumer products, automotive devices, and analog ICs. Its products are also used in wireless/RF and analog devices, portable products, data storage systems, notebook computers, and pagers; power supplies, converters and power motor controls, hand-held instruments, battery powered consumer products, etc.; and automotive consumer and communications products. The company was formerly known as Nantong Fujitsu Microelectronics Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Tongfu Microelectronics Co.,Ltd in December 2016. Tongfu Microelectronics Co.,Ltd was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Nantong, China.

002161.SZ.summary: Invengo Information Technology Co., Ltd. provides radio frequency identification technology, products, and systems solutions in China and internationally. The company offers retail tags, fixed and portable readers, retail equipment, and application software for retail application; and book equipment products, such as book labels, self-help library products, self-service lending systems, mobile inventory systems, book sorting systems, and security access control systems. It also provides railway application products, including car number labels, reading devices, portable readers, compilers, and simulation testing equipment; and textile washing products comprising textile washing labels, reading and writing equipment, RFID cabinets, application software, and other products. In addition, the company offers travel application products consisting of passport products, and reading writing instruments; and RFID products, such as electronic tags, readers, and antennas and others. Invengo Information Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

002169.SZ.summary: Guangzhou Zhiguang Electric Co., Ltd. provides energy technology products and services. The company offers motor control, grid control, electric power cable, energy conversion, and power automation products. It also provides turnkey solution for large industrial electrical power saving and efficiency projects, and energy conservation and efficiency enhancement in large-sized power plants; optimal utilization of regional energy and integrated energy systems; and design for power engineering, as well as offers electricity investment, electricity distribution, and electricity services. Guangzhou Zhiguang Electric Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.

002179.SZ.long_name: AVIC Jonhon Optronic Technology Co., Ltd.
002179.SZ.summary: AVIC Jonhon Optronic Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development of optical, electrical, fluid technology, and integrated solutions in China. Its electrical connectors include various connectors comprising circular, rectangular, data transmission, filter, and network electrical connectors, as well as RF coaxial series adapters; and optical connectors comprise optical passive connectors, optical transceiver modules, and optical and electrical equipment and systems. The company also provides interconnect solutions. Its products are used in the aviation, aerospace and military, telecom and data center equipment, railway transportation, new energy vehicle, power equipment, petroleum equipment, medical equipment, intelligent equipment, and other civil industrial fields. The company also exports its products to approximately 30 countries and regions, including Europe, the United States, Israel, Australia, Korea, India, etc. The company was formerly known as China Aviation Optical-Electrical Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to AVIC Jonhon Optronic Technology Co., Ltd. in July 2016. AVIC Jonhon Optronic Technology Co., Ltd. is headquartered in Luoyang, China.

002180.SZ.summary: Ninestar Corporation operates as an imaging products and service provider. Its principal products include laser printers, copiers, integrated circuit chips, replacement print consumables, and cartridge core components. The company was formerly known as Apex Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Ninestar Corporation in May 2017. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Zhuhai, the People's Republic of China.

002185.SZ.summary: Tianshui Huatian Technology Co., Ltd. operates as an IC packaging and testing company. The company offers lead frame packaging products; and analog and mixed signal/RF testing services, as well as wafer probing, test development, and design and simulation services. It has operations in China, Taiwan, Hong Kong, Singapore, South Korea, the United States, etc. Tianshui Huatian Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Tianshui, China.

002189.SZ.summary: Costar Group Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, sells, and services optical components and parts in China. It provides various shape and special material optical lens; optical prisms for use in light engine for advanced LCDs, DLPs, and LCOS displays, as well as DVD series prisms and dichroic mirrors; and special type components, such as high-precision optical components for large-diameter super-smooth optical plano-surface and super-smooth optical spherical-surface, as well as high-power laser optical components, aspherical, infrared components, coating products, etc. The company also designs and manufactures various lens assembly, projection lens, monitoring lens, fingerprint device lens, fixed focus projection lens, and zoom projection lens; light engines, including DLP, portable LED, minisize LED embedded type, single and three panel LCOS, large type three-DLP, and laser light engines; and optical auxiliary materials. In addition, it provides mechanical parts; photoresistance cells; and single piece or glued optical low pass filter products used in digital cameras, monitoring systems, digital vidicon, etc. Costar Group Co., Ltd. exports its products to Japan, the United States, Germany, South Korea, Hong Kong, and Taiwan. The company was formerly known as Lida Optical and Electronic Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Costar Group Co., Ltd. in 2019. Costar Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is based in Nanyang, China.

002194.SZ.long_name: Wuhan Fingu Electronic Technology Co., Ltd.
002194.SZ.summary: Wuhan Fingu Electronic Technology Co., Ltd. develops and sells RF components and devices for mobile communication antenna feeder systems. The company provides filter products, such as duplexers, combiners, tower mounted amplifiers, etc.; and POI, dielectric materials, and microwave products. Wuhan Fingu Electronic Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1989 and is based in Wuhan, China.

002212.SZ.summary: Topsec Technologies Group Inc., together with its subsidiaries, research, develops, manufactures, and sells wires and cables in China. It offers low voltage cables, such as control, insulated halogen-free low-smoke, and armored power cables, as well as copper core cross-linked polyethylene insulated copper wires; medium voltage cables, including copper core XLPE insulated PVC sheathed power cables; and high voltage cables, such as XLPE insulated power cables. The company also provides special cables comprising aluminum alloy, mineral flexible, marine, and frequency conversion environmental protection cables, as well as offers wire products. In addition, it offers security and data products, including security gateway, security detection, secure access, data security, cloud security, and data and other related products; and security consulting, safe operation and maintenance, security research and development, security cloud services, etc. for government, finance, energy, telecommunications, and other industries. The company was formerly known as Nanyang Topsec Technologies Group Inc. and changed its name to Topsec Technologies Group Inc. in November 2020. Topsec Technologies Group Inc.  was founded in 1985 and is based in Shantou City, China.

002218.SZ.summary: SHENZHEN TOPRAYSOLAR Co.,Ltd. operates as an integrated solar manufacturer in China, Europe, North America, Africa, and internationally. The company offers solar glasses, solar cells, solar wafers, and solar ingots. It also provides on grid and off grid solar panels, such as mono and poly crystalline solar panels; and regular, flexible, folding, and solar blanket panels. In addition, the company offers solar consumer products comprising solar chargers that include electronic chargers, automotive products, charge regulators, and accessories; solar power kits; solar lightings; and solar home improvement products, as well as solar battery chips, solar power systems, solar energy absorbers, and water heater systems. Further, it provides EPC services, which comprise design, procurement, installation, and civic works, as well as operation and maintenance services for solar projects. It also develops and operates solar power plants with a capacity of 110MW in Dingbian, China. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

002222.SZ.summary: CASTECH Inc. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells crystals, optics, and laser components primarily in China. The company offers NLO, laser, magneto-optical, birefringent, AO and EO, and scintillation crystals, as well as oven and temperature controller accessories; precision optics, including coatings, materials, windows, mirrors, prisms, polarizers, cylindrical lenses, spherical lenses, waveplates, and beam splitters; and laser components, such as AO and EO devices, isolators and rotators, attenuators, beam expanders, fiber collimators, and laser lenses. It also exports its products to North America, Europe, Japan, and other Asian countries. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Fuzhou, China.

002230.SZ.summary: Iflytek Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development of artificial intelligence (AI) technologies. The company develops and offers software and chip products. It also provides machine translation systems; intelligent speech, medical image, and cognitive intelligence based auxiliary medical systems; and smart voice court hearing systems for politics and laws. In addition, the company offers smart education products for teaching students; AI voice assistants, vehicle-mounted AI systems, and all-in-one infotainment systems for smart automobiles; and call center solutions for channeling voice self-services. Iflytek Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Hefei, China.

002231.SZ.summary: Allwin Telecommunication Co., Ltd. develops, produces, and sells radio frequency, microwave, and wireless communications network coverage system products in China and internationally. It offers repeater series products, including wireless wideband, wireless channel selective, fiber optic, and frequency shifting repeaters, as well as boosters, micro-cell boosters, base station extending systems, and bi-directional tower-mounted amplifiers. The company also provides microwave passive components, such as micro-strip and cavity power splitters, micro-strip and cavity power couplers, single-band and multi-band combiners, 3 dB hybrid couplers, attenuators, and load components. In addition, it offers antenna series products comprising indoor ceiling omni-directional, indoor panel directional, outdoor panel directional, outdoor yagi directional, grid parabolic, corner, outdoor directional, and special antennas. Further, the company provides network management monitor systems, repeater-supported network software systems, digital multimedia broadcasting gap fillers, and mini-repeaters. Additionally, it offers solutions for the coverage of scenic spots, sea areas, tunnels, roads and railways, suburban and rural areas, stadiums and exhibition centers, university campus, and residential districts, as well as for indoor coverage; and for the dispatch of wireless network resources, upgradation of 3G indoor coverage system, and elevators. Allwin Telecommunication Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Shenyang, China.

002232.SZ.summary: Qiming Information Technology Co.,Ltd provides products and services in the areas of smart manufacturing, smart cars, and smart cities in China. The company's management software products include ERP, intelligent manufacturing, smart logistics, collaborative office, basic research and development, market consulting service, big data value-added application, and industrial Internet platform, as well as management software implementation services. It also provides intelligent networking, new energy, vehicle diagnostic, automotive electronic testing, and electronic and electrical architecture development services. In addition, the company offers smart logistics, smart transportation, and car information security services; and Qiming Cloud platform solution. Further, it provides solutions for vehicle manufacturers, including electronic and electrical design and integration testing, diagnostic communication development, comfort system electronic control unit development, battery system design and trial production, trial engineering, high-voltage electrical design, powertrain test and system solution verification, control strategy consulting, power system design, and MBD and integration testing services. Qiming Information Technology Co.,Ltd was founded in 2000 and is based in Changchun, China.

002241.SZ.summary: Goertek Inc. researches, develops, produces, and sells electro-acoustic components, optical components, electronic accessories, and related products worldwide. The company offers smart wearable products, such as smart watches and bands; smart viewable products, including VR HMD and panorama cameras; smart viewable peripherals; smart audio products comprising ear and headphones; smart lamps; and smart robotics, voice-controlled speakers, and unmanned aerial vehicles. It also provides components consisting of sensors, microphones, speakers and receivers, loud speakers, linear vibration motors, antennas, and optical component modules, as well as game controllers and data gloves. Goertek Inc. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Weifang, the People's Republic of China.

002253.SZ.summary: Wisesoft Co., Ltd. provides technologies, systems, and services for the air traffic field in China. It offers flight flow management systems, portable emergency air traffic control systems, air traffic management integrated information management systems, radar control simulators, desktop tower simulators, tower control simulators, program control simulators, and multi-channel digital synchronous recorders. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Chengdu, China.

002273.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Crystal-Optech Co., Ltd researches, develops, and manufactures optical imaging, LED, micro display, and reflective materials in China. The company offers optical imaging products, including optical low pass filters, infra-red cut filters (IRCF), blue glass IRCF, IRCF with black masks, IRCF and lens assemblies, and IRCF switchers, as well as spacer wafers, pattern coatings, resin IRCF, CMOS covers, lens covers, and UV filters; projectors comprising polarization beam splitters, integral type color wheels, sequential color recaptures, color selective mirrors, LCOS seal glasses, and heat-dissipating bands; and watch cover glass products. It also provides doublet spherical lenses, spherical mirrors, miniature triangular prisms, total reflection prisms, and combination prisms; and ultra AR coatings, AR coated covers, and high reflection coatings, as well as narrow band pass, long pass, dual band pass, triple band pass, and RGB filters. In addition, the company offers short focus projectors and smart glass, head-up display, and compact projector products; sapphire crystals products, and flat sapphire substrate and patterned sapphire substrate for LEDs; sapphire optical products; reflective material series; and safety protection products. Its products are primarily applied in digital, mobile phones, security monitoring, computers, and other digital camera lenses, as well as semiconductor illuminations, micro projectors, smart glasses, road traffic marks, and safety protections. Zhejiang Crystal-Optech Co., Ltd was founded in 2002 and is based in Taizhou, China.

002280.SZ.long_name: Hangzhou Lianluo Interactive Information Technology Co.,Ltd
002280.SZ.summary: Hangzhou Lianluo Interactive Information Technology Co.,Ltd operates as an e-commerce company in China. It is involved in the various activities, such as e-commerce services platform; eSports and broadcasting networks; distribution and production of television and movies; and operation of airport media, as well as investment activities. The company also provides Internet financial services; and smart devices under MOPS brand that include virtual reality retinal glasses, smart masks, battery cases, Bluetooth headsets, and other related products. Hangzhou Lianluo Interactive Information Technology Co.,Ltd was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

002281.SZ.summary: Accelink Technologies Co,Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, supplies, and sells optoelectronic devices for optical communications industry primarily in China. The company offers receptacle optical interfaces, optical amplifiers, fiber-optical amplifiers, EDFA modules, transceivers, transceiver modules, and integrated coherent receivers, as well as passive components, including switches, splitters, DCMs, attenuators, wavelength management components, micro-optics, inter connect and cabling components, and functional modules. It also provides active optical cables, integrated modules, OLT modules, and datasheets; and subsystem, such as integrated WDM system, data center interconnects, optical line protection systems, optical line monitor systems, ultra-long haul systems, access products, optical TAPs, TAPs and NPBs, fiber capacity multiplication systems, instruments, and serial device servers. In addition, the company offers solutions for 100G, DATACOM, FTTX, DWDM, and intelligent options; optical line protection, ultra-long haul optical transmission, integrated WDM, optical TAP, fiber capacity multiplication, optical line monitors, and data center integration. It exports its products to telecommunications companies in approximately 20 countries and regions. The company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Wuhan, the People's Republic of China.

002288.SZ.summary: Guangdong Chaohua Technology Co., Ltd. primarily produces and sells printed circuit boards in China and internationally. The company offers single-sided, double-sided, and multilayer printed circuit boards. It also provides paper based laminates and composite base copper clad laminates; electrolytic copper foils; solder masks, resistant inks, and legends; wood pulp papers for CCL; and CNC drilling machines. The company is based in Meizhou, China.

002289.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Success Electronics Co., Ltd develops and manufactures sensors, capacitive touch screens, small and medium size LCDs and corresponding modules, and glass cover products. It offers TN, HTN, STN, CSTN, and TFT LCDs; and GFF, OGS, and GG capacitive touch screens. The company also provides a range of touch and display integrated solutions for smart phone manufacturers. Its products are used in communications terminals, household appliances, automotive electronics, digital products, and other industries. The company exports its products to Europe, Japan, South Korea, Singapore, and other countries. Shenzhen Success Electronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002308.SZ.summary: Vtron Group Co.,Ltd. researches and develops, manufactures, sells, and services control room and video wall collaboration total solutions worldwide. The company's video wall solutions include display cubes, narrow bezel LCD panels and indoor LED displays, video wall processors, and visualization interactive system for barrier-free collaboration. It also provides video wall control software; and interactive digital boards. The company's products are primarily used in traffic control, energy and utilities, security and military, public emergency centers, broadcasting, corporate, and advertising industries. The company was formerly known as Vtron Technologies Ltd. and changed its name to Vtron Group Co.,Ltd. in January 2017. Vtron Group Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.

002313.SZ.summary: Sunsea AIoT Technology Co., Ltd. provides end-to-end Internet of Things (IoT) products and services to telecom operators, ICT equipment vendors, system integrators, and enterprise customers in China and internationally. It offers cable broadband products in various categories, such as OSP, corridor, central office, passive optical components, and customer premise; wireless sites, including shelter, towers, and outdoor cabinets; base station and landscaping antennas, and feeder accessories; small cell products; and new energy products, including energy efficiency control systems, refrigerants, and LED lighting products. The company also provides IoT industry solutions, including smart water supply, smart lighting, smart transportation, smart parking, smart logistics, smart building, smart environment, and location based solutions. In addition, it offers MediaFirst platform operation, CDN/UDN, and IPTV value-added services; micro module data center, closed aisle, and integrated data center solutions; data center products, such as equipment cabinet, power supply, and refrigeration systems; and cloud computing, network function virtualization, software defined network, big data and business agility suite, and other solutions. It also serves health, agriculture, environment, energy, transportation, and industrial manufacturing industries. The company was formerly known as SUNSEA Telecommunications Co., Ltd. Sunsea AIoT Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

002331.SZ.summary: Anhui Wantong Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the transportation information system integration, application software development, and operation and maintenance services in China. It provides system integration solutions used in expressways, port terminals, urban intelligent transportation, trunk roads, inland waterways, logistics tracking and justice, taxation, insurance, education, and other industry information fields. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Hefei, China.

002338.SZ.summary: Changchun UP Optotech Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of photoelectric measurement and control equipment, optical materials, and other products in China. Its principal products include TV goniometers, antenna pedestals, photoelectric theodolite optical and mechanical subsystems, aviation/aerospace camera optical and mechanical subsystems, radar antenna pedestals, medical testing instruments, K9 optical glasses, etc. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Changchun, China.

002351.SZ.summary: Edifier Technology Co., Ltd. provides audio solutions for home, consumer electronics, and PC multimedia applications. It produces and sells sound bars and speaker systems; Bluetooth, portable, bookshelf, home theatre, gaming, and computer speakers; accessories comprising speaker stands and cables, and wireless and wired remotes; and speakers for TV and living rooms, as well as headphones. The company offers its products through a network of distributors in North America, South America, Europe, the Middle East, and the Asia Pacific regions. Edifier Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002362.SZ.summary: Hanwang Technology Co., Ltd. designs and develops handwriting recognition, optical character recognition, and handwriting input products worldwide.
