The company offers WISEreader, a portable electronic book; Dictionary Pen, a multifunctional scanning pen; HWPen that integrates handwriting technology and electromagnetic induction technology for different modes of computer handwriting board; Tablet, a professional painting tool for art; Scan Pen for text readers; Mini Scanner, a portable hand-held offline data input device designed for mobile office working; MousePen, which is used for writing, reading, and identify pictures and text on the screen; and bionic flapping wing. It also provides office application products, such as high-speed professional scanners, starter edition scanners, and documents cameras; Face Go; and C-pen and E-signature products. In addition, the company offers PM2.5 Detector, a handheld instrument that conducts real-time measurement of the concentration and quality of airborne particles; and household indoor air purifiers and haze removal machines. Its products are primarily used in e-government, personal office, mobile communication, digital home appliances, and other applications. Hanwang Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

002368.SZ.summary: Taiji Computer Corporation Limited provides information technology services primarily in China. The company designs and constructs information systems; and provides consulting, infrastructure, strategic planning, system design, software development, system integration, operation and maintenance outsourcing, and other value added services, as well as industry solutions for integrated IT service systems. It also offers smart city integration, public safety, intelligent building management, data center, and information security solutions. The company serves various industries, such as government, finance, energy, manufacturing, and public utilities. Taiji Computer Corporation Limited was founded in 1987 and is based in Beijing, China.

002369.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Zowee Technology Co., Ltd. researches, designs, manufactures, and sells products for use in communication products, computers, consumer electronics, etc. worldwide. The company also provides electronics manufacturing services, including mold development and manufacturing, as well as molding and spray printing; supply chain management; printed circuit board assembly; product assembly and packaging; system integration and testing; and production track systems and automation systems development. It serves the mobile terminal, network communication, intelligent home, wearable, automation, and consumer products sectors. The company was formerly known as Zowee Technology Development Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shenzhen Zowee Technology Co., Ltd. in August 2007. Shenzhen Zowee Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is based in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.

002371.SZ.summary: NAURA Technology Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of electronic equipment and components in the People's Republic of China. The company offers semiconductor equipment, including etching equipment, physical vapor deposition and chemical vapor deposition equipment, oxidation/diffusion equipment, cleaning systems, annealing, and other semiconductor equipment, as well as flat panel display manufacturing equipment, gas mass flow controllers, and other components; and vacuum, atmosphere-protective, and continuous heat treatment equipment, as well as crystal growth equipment, which are used in new energy, new materials, vacuum electronics, aerospace and magnetic materials, and other fields. It also provides turn-key lithium ion battery solutions, including mixer series, coater series, slitting machine series, rolling mill series, winding machine series, laminating machine series, and automatic assembly lines for chip packaging, test equipment, drying equipment, battery pack production line, energy storage cabinets, and others. In addition, the company offers precision components, such as precision resistors, tantalum capacitors, quartz crystal devices, microwave components, power supplies, hybrid integrated circuits, and electronic components for use in aerospace, aviation, automatic control, power electronics, precision instrument, and rail transport industries. The company was formerly known as Beijing Sevenstar Electronics Co., Ltd. and changed its name to NAURA Technology Group Co., Ltd. in February 2017. NAURA Technology Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

002373.SZ.summary: China Transinfo Technology Co., Ltd. operates as a transportation operator and traffic data service provider. The company offers traffic solutions and security system for the urban transportation, highway transportation, rail transportation, civil aviation, water transportation, and other fields. China Transinfo Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

002380.SZ.long_name: Nanjing Sciyon Wisdom Technology Group Co., Ltd.
002380.SZ.summary: Nanjing Sciyon Wisdom Technology Group Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells industrial automation and informatization products and solutions in China and internationally. The company offers smart control products, such as smart management systems, intelligent safety production management systems, equipment monitoring and accident prediction systems, intelligent maintenance and training systems, intelligent simulation and training systems, manufacturing execution systems, and intelligent manufacturing information systems, as well as smart control center products. It also provides intelligent control products, such as distributed control, digital electro-hydraulic control, failure safe control, intelligent combustion optimization, intelligent ammonia injection zone control, equipment fault diagnosis and early warning, and intelligent operation optimization systems, as well as touch screens, universal/marine turbine controllers, and integrated/medium-scale programmable controllers. In addition, the company offers smart devices comprising intelligent electric actuators, personnel positioning system, condenser online cleaning robots, boiler furnace parameter measurement systems, warehouse empty preheaters, ranging cable systems, air powder parameter measurement, combustion system parameter detection, and optimization control, smart inverters, and AC servo drives. Further, it provides training and other support services. Nanjing Sciyon Wisdom Technology Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Nanjing, China.

002383.SZ.long_name: Beijing Unistrong Science & Technology Co., Ltd.
002383.SZ.summary: Beijing UniStrong Science & Technology Co., Ltd. designs and manufactures high-precision products and services for the geospatial marketplace worldwide. It offers a range of solutions for various fields of applications and industries, such as building and construction, land survey and cadastral survey, geographic information systems (GIS) data collection, 3D scanning, agriculture and smart farming, and land and structure monitoring. The company provides its products and services for original equipment/design manufacturer, machine control and guidance, survey and mapping, GIS, L-band correction services, marine, field mobile worker, monitoring, and unmanned systems markets. Beijing UniStrong Science & Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Beijing, China.

002384.SZ.long_name: Suzhou Dongshan Precision Manufacturing Co., Ltd.
002384.SZ.summary: Suzhou Dongshan Precision Manufacturing Co., Ltd. produces and sells critical components for IoT intelligence, telecommunication equipment, metal precision, LED technologies, and interconnect solutions. The company offers flexible circuits, flexible circuit assembly products, flexible circuit module assembly products, rigid printed circuit boards (PCB), flexible printed circuits, rigid-flex PCBs, and PCB assembly and box build products for automotive, telecom equipment, consumer electronics, high-reliability systems, telecommunications infrastructure, and consumer technology applications. It also provides HD electronic display products, such as indoor fine-pitch RGB and outdoor RGB products for HD displays, TV backlights, mobile phones, and other lighting applications. In addition, the company offers telecom equipment and metal precision products comprising base station antennas, RF filters, technical ceramic products, sheet metal products, stamping parts, die-casting products, and CNC and thermal products for the automotive, communication base station, and medical treatment applications. It provides its products and services in mainland China, Taiwan, South Korea, Finland, India, Sweden, Germany, Poland, Estonia, the United States, and Mexico. The company was formerly known as Suzhou Dongshan Sheet Metal Liability Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Suzhou Dongshan Precision Manufacturing Co., Ltd. in 2007. Suzhou Dongshan Precision Manufacturing Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Suzhou, China.

002387.SZ.summary: Visionox Technology Inc. researches, develops, manufactures, markets, and sells organic light emitting display products worldwide. The company provides active-matrix organic light-emitting diode display and passive-matrix organic light-emitting diode flexible display products that are used in the consumer electronics, communications, railways, petroleum, chemical, metallurgy, machinery, industrial control instruments, finance, health care, automotive displays, and other industries. It also provides aftersales services. The company was formerly known as Blackcow Food Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Visionox Technology Inc. in June 2018. Visionox Technology Inc. was founded in 1996 and is based in Chaoyang, China.

002396.SZ.summary: Fujian Star-net Communication Co., Ltd. provides information-based solutions for enterprise customers in China. It offers network communication equipment, cloud computing, POS terminal, desktop cloud, wireless and broadband access, unified communications, and video information application products and services in the areas of disaster prevention and reduction. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Fuzhou, China.

002405.SZ.summary: NavInfo Co., Ltd. provides digital map content, Internet of Vehicles and dynamic traffic information service, and location-based vertical application services worldwide. The company offers ADAS maps, high-precision maps, navigation engines, and ADAS chips. It serves car navigation, consumer electronic navigation, the Internet and mobile Internet, government, and enterprise applications. NavInfo Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Beijing, China.

002409.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Yoke Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development of electronic semiconductor materials, cryogenic composite materials, and plastic additives materials. It also offers flame retardants for plastics. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Yixing, China.

002410.SZ.summary: Glodon Company Limited provides professional application software and support services to the construction industry. The company offers various products and services, such as cost management, BIM construction, digital enterprise. It operates in China, the United States, the United Kingdom, Finland, Sweden, Singapore, Hong Kong, Malaysia, Indonesia, India, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Glodon Software Company Limited and changed its name to Glodon Company Limited in June 2016. Glodon Company Limited was founded in 1998 and is based in Beijing, China.

002413.SZ.long_name: Jiangsu Leike Defense Technology Co., Ltd.
002413.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Leike Defense Technology Co., Ltd. operates as a civil-military integration enterprise that researches, develops, produces, and sells radar systems, remote sensing, satellite navigation, digital systems, analog simulation, and security storage for space, aviation, and ground industries. It offers wall probing radar, Mini-SAR, the millimeter-wave radar, the phased array radar, and the slope stability radar used in national defense, public security, frontier defense, geological disaster monitoring, regional protection, and automobile active safety. The company is also involved in processing algorithms of multi-source remote sensing data, and anti-radiation remote sensing data processing SOC chips; and provides real-time onboard, ground raw data, and specialized data processing, as well as system integration services. In addition, it provides baseband processing chips, serialization modules, and complete machines used in general and specialized military equipment, as well as signal acquisition, tracking, observation processing, and PVT solution services. Further, the company offers digital design and simulation, experiment verification, performance evaluation, and operational maintenance in the field of radar systems, satellite navigation, and electronic warfare. Additionally, it provides LNA, BUC, microwave frequency conversion, matrix switch, mediation, spectrum monitoring, automatic detection, frequency domain situation, and equipment status monitoring services; and embedded military-use storage devices, secret-related computer storage disks, portable storage devices, and large-scale information storage systems. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Changfa Refrigeration Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Jiangsu Leike Defense Technology Co., Ltd. in November 2015. Jiangsu Leike Defense Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Changzhou, China.

002414.SZ.summary: Wuhan Guide Infrared Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of infrared thermal imaging systems primarily in Asia. The company offers localization cooled and uncooled IR detectors; system integration cores and modules; law enforcement and temperature measurement systems; personal vision products; and automotive thermal imaging obstacle avoidance systems. Its infrared products are used in various applications, including electric power, metallurgy, petrochemical, construction, firefighting, law enforcement, inspection and quarantine, security and surveillance, ADAS night vision system, and others. The company a strategic cooperation agreement with Foresight Autonomous Holdings Ltd. to develop and market Foresight's QuadSight sensor system combined with guide infrared applications to customers in China. Wuhan Guide Infrared Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Wuhan, the People's Republic of China.

002415.SZ.long_name: Hangzhou Hikvision Digital Technology Co., Ltd.
002415.SZ.summary: Hangzhou Hikvision Digital Technology Co., Ltd. provides video-centered intelligent Internet of Things solutions and big data services worldwide. The company offers network cameras, PTZ cameras, explosion-proof and anti-corrosion series products, network video recorders, data center and storage products, and power-over-Ethernet and Wi-Fi kits; and turbo HD cameras, DVRs, PTZ cameras, and portable products. It also provides transmission products, including network switches, cables, and wireless bridges; display and control products, which include digital signages, interactive tablets, monitors, LCD video walls and displays, and controllers; and intelligent traffic products that include signal control and traffic flow systems, smart surveillance and AID systems, entrance and exit management products, checkpoint and intersection violation systems, and parking guidance products. In addition, the company offers access control products comprising face recognition and card terminals, controllers, turnstiles, fingerprint terminals, readers, electrical locks, and kits; video intercom products, 2-wire, 4-wire, 8-wire, and IP products and doorbells; security, thermography, and common vision thermal cameras; alarm products, including intrusion alarm panel, intrusion detector, emergency alarm, and security radar products; CCTV, access control, mobile, traffic, transmission and display, and video intercom product accessories; and HiLook IP, turbo HD, and transmission products. Further, it provides HikCentral Professional, an integrated security software for video security, access control, intrusion alarm, etc.; HikCentral Enterprise; Hik-Connect mobile app; and Hik-ProConnect, a cloud-based solution. It serves the public security, transportation, retail, education, healthcare, financial institutions, intelligent buildings, and other markets. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, the People's Republic of China.

002417.SZ.summary: SUNA Co.,Ltd operates in the information and communication industry in China. The company offers government data collection and sharing, time and space information cloud, trusted electronic document management application, ecological civilization big data, grid service management, and practitioner management platforms; and travel, campus, fire protection, and prison solutions. It also offers indoor signal coverage integrated, netcom integrated coverage, customer, city village coverage, campus coverage, cell coverage, and sea area coverage solutions. The company was formerly known as Fujian Sunnada Communication Co.,Ltd and changed its name to SUNA Co.,Ltd in February 2018. SUNA Co.,Ltd was founded in 1998 and is based in Fuzhou, China.

002420.SZ.summary: Guangzhou Echom Sci.&Tech.Co,.Ltd provides design and manufacturing services worldwide. The company develops and produces black home appliances, including home TV, smart TV boxes, smart flat screen TV, business/home dual use large-screen ultra-high-definition televisions, and remote controls; and exterior structures of home entertainment products, such as monitors, commercial large-screen interactive integrated machines, various players, digital set-top boxes, outdoor advertising machines, and laptops. It also provides various accessories for home appliances; automotive interior and exterior decoration products comprising instrument panel, door guard plate, column, and bumper assembly products; audio products of flat-panel TVs and monitors; kitchen appliances; double-color injection machines, household electrical appliances, and laser scoring machines; and automotive front and rear bumpers, car dashboards, interior and exterior trims, and other precision molds and parts. In addition, the company designs, manufactures, sells, and leases building materials; and produces template components that are used in various building structures, including walls, columns, beams, and plates. Guangzhou Echom Sci.&Tech.Co,.Ltd was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.

002421.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Das Intellitech Co., Ltd. provides intelligent building and energy management solutions in China. The company offers central air-conditioning energy management systems; central air-conditioning energy saving control systems; C3 card systems; and smart home products, access control products and accessories, and consumer and attendance products. It also offers energy monitoring and management platform for urban buildings; metro integrated monitoring software system for rail transit lines; and community integrated management platform. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002436.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen Fastprint Circuit Tech Co., Ltd.
002436.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Fastprint Circuit Tech Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells PCBs in China and internationally. It offers backplanes, HDI boards, high frequency boards, high TG boards, halogen-free boards, flex and rigid-flex boards, and other boards for use in high-tech products; rigid multilayer PCBs, metal-substrate PCBs, HDI PCBs, high-speed signal transmission boards, and semiconductor test products; and IC substrates. The company also provides PCB design services, such as PCB layout design, signal and power integrity design, EMC design and rectification, high speed test, and automatic router training services; and PCB assembly services for electronics manufacturers. It primarily serves communications, aerospace, defense, IT, medical equipment, precision test equipment, and industrial control companies. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

002439.SZ.summary: Venustech Group Inc. provides network security products, trusted security management platforms, and specialized security services and solutions worldwide. The company offers security products, such as unified threat management, firewall, intrusion detection systems, intrusion prevention systems, Web application firewall, Web application audio systems, security operations center, database audit, and vulnerabilities scanning, and security management, as well as application delivery controller products. It primarily serves Chinese banking institutions, state-owned enterprises, and Chinese telecom operators. The company was formerly known as Beijing Venustech Inc. Venustech Group Inc. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

002446.SZ.long_name: Guangdong Shenglu Telecommunication Tech. Co., Ltd.
002446.SZ.summary: Guangdong Shenglu Telecommunication Tech. Co., Ltd. manufactures and markets antennas for communications, automotive electronics, RF devices, and other industries in the People's Republic of China. It offers backbone network transmission, base station, terminal, car, microwave, and Beidou antennas; and passive and active devices, TR modules, and smart vehicle information systems. The company also provides communication, 5G mobile communications, E-band, and V-band antennas, as well as RF microwave devices. In addition, it offers electrical performance testing services for communication antennas; environmental testing services for electronic communication products and automotive electronics; and other EMC electromagnetic compatibility testing services. The company was formerly known as Shenglu Antenna Ltd. and changed its name to Guangdong Shenglu Telecommunication Tech. Co., Ltd. in 2007. Guangdong Shenglu Telecommunication Tech. Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Foshan, the People's Republic of China.

002449.SZ.summary: Foshan NationStar Optoelectronics Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells LED components and application products in the People's Republic of China. The company offers LED chips for lighting, display, and backlight applications; components for lighting, such as flip-chips, chip-on-boards, and CSPs for a range of applications comprising illuminaires, lighting fixtures, and LCD TV backlights; and display components. It also provides components for indicating that include plastic packages and cutting dicing, and other products; and LED display modules, backlights, and light bars with SMT lines and automatic backlight-lense mounting lines for various applications, which comprise home electronics, including air conditioners, LCD TVs, and billboards. In addition, the company offers non-visual LED devices, including ultraviolet, infrared, and horticulture LED devices; and LED lighting products, such LED battens, tubes, downlights, panels, strips, and modules for commercial, decoration, residential, and outdoor lighting applications. Foshan NationStar Optoelectronics Co.,Ltd was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Foshan, the People's Republic of China.

002456.SZ.summary: OFILM Group Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells optic and photoelectric products. Its products include compact camera modules, touch panel modules, fingerprint recognition module, and electronic products of intelligent vehicles. The company's products are used in consumer electronics, as well as smart phones, tablets, PCs, smart cars, and wearable electronics. It operates in China, the United States, Japan, South Korea, and Europe. The company was formerly known as O-film Tech Co., Ltd. and changed its name to OFILM Group Co., Ltd. in March 2019. OFILM Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002463.SZ.summary: Wus Printed Circuit (Kunshan) Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, design, manufacture, and sale of printed circuit boards in China. The company offers backplane, line card, power amplifier, antenna, and server products. Its products are used in communications, communications equipment, and automobiles markets. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Kunshan, China.

002465.SZ.long_name: Guangzhou Haige Communications Group Incorporated Company
002465.SZ.summary: Guangzhou Haige Communications Group Incorporated Company, together with its subsidiaries, researches, develops, manufactures, and markets communication and navigation equipment in China. It offers quality assurance solutions for the information application customers, such as government, finance, transportation, and national defense; TETRA system, a mobile communication system used in group dispatch and command communication in the field of specific mobile communication; RF chips for the satellite navigation systems; and environment test equipment and detection instruments for detecting and testing the electronic equipment. The company also provides portable, vehicular/shipborne/airborne, and fixed HF communication radio; satellite communication products, such as satellite geostations, satellite communication antennas, and satellite geostation product modules; and navigation equipment for the army arms covering naval and armored force, and artillery troops, as well as civil aviation, ship, and vehicle and time servicing. In addition, it offers system integration solutions for base station control radio, field integrated communication system, and Ethernet integrated communication system; and transmission control platform based on TDM, NGN, and ATM, as well as training, technical support, equipment maintenance, maneuver assurance services, etc. The company was founded in 1956 and is based in Guangzhou, China.

002474.SZ.summary: Fujian Rongji Software Co., Ltd. engages in the development and distribution of software products in China. The company offers software products for e-government, judicial, quality inspection information, and environmental information industries. The company also provides network engineering, data center, disaster recovery, information security, collaborative management, and system integration services. It primarily serves energy, telecommunication, finance, and manufacturing industries. Fujian Rongji Software Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Fuzhou, China.

002475.SZ.summary: Luxshare Precision Industry Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, designs, manufactures, and sells cable assembly and connector system solutions worldwide. The company primarily offers cable assemblies, connectors, power cables, antennas, bare wires, coaxial and flexible cables, flexible printed circuit boards, precision hardware/plastic components, acoustic components, and smart wearables. Its products are used in enterprise, cloud, automotive, medical applications, as well as consumer electronics, such as computers, devices, and peripherals. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Dongguan, China.

002504.SZ.long_name: Beijing Honggao Creative Architectural Design Co., Ltd
002504.SZ.summary: Beijing Honggao Creative Architectural Design Co., Ltd provides interior design services in China. It offers fine decoration construction, electromechanical installation, curtain wall construction, and construction general contracting services for hotels, office spaces, commercial complexes, medical, exhibition halls, and apartment clubs. It also engages in the equity investment activities; and provides mergers and acquisitions services in BIM, VR, design, consulting, construction technology, education and training, Internet, and construction industries. In addition, the company invests in and finances independent projects and cooperation with real estate enterprises. Beijing Honggao Creative Architectural Design Co., Ltd was founded in 1993 and is based in Beijing, China.

002506.SZ.long_name: GCL System Integration Technology Co., Ltd.
002506.SZ.summary: GCL System Integration Technology Co., Ltd. provides solar energy solutions in China and internationally. It offers solar modules, trackers, solar panels, electric cabinets, cables, monitor software systems, mounting systems, inverters, and EV chargers; and lithium batteries that enable customers to optimize the use of their residential solar energy system, as well as home energy management systems. The company also provides solar cube 20K/50K for small population areas with weak power supply; G-Home solar kit for home owners; financial services, such as leasing and capital fund services; and smart operation and management platform comprising cloud data and risk management. In addition, it operates 2.5 MW solar block to supply energy to solar power plants; and offers cells, system integration, engineering procumbent construction, stored energy, etc. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Suzhou, China.

002512.SZ.summary: Tatwah Smartech Co., Ltd. engages in the Internet of Things smart industry, satellite and communication, Internet new media, and artificial intelligence businesses in China and internationally. It operates through Electronic Component Manufacturing, Software Industry, Intelligent Transportation, Information Technology Industry, Printing Trade, Consulting Services, and Others segments. The company develops, produces, and sells smart cards, smart electronic tags, and RFID card readers; Internet TV motherboards, electronic communication and remote start devices; household appliances; multimedia communication and digital imaging products; and computer hardware products. It also offers computer software application and technical services for telecommunication systems. In addition, the company provides printing services for packaging and decoration items; and information and technical consulting services. Further, it offers planning, construction, and operation services for communication operators; and intelligent audio and video system integration solutions. The company also exports its products. Tatwah Smartech Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Fuzhou, China.

002519.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Yinhe Electronics Co.,Ltd. engages in the new energy electric vehicle components, defense and military special equipment, and digital TV intelligent terminal equipment businesses in China and internationally. The company offers new energy electric vehicle products, including intelligent chargers for electric cars; electric scroll compressors; and precision sheet metal products, such as power battery boxes for electric vehicles, solar power inverters, high/low voltage power transmission and distribution equipment, etc. It also provides electromechanical management systems comprising load management, power distribution management, power management, power supply, and environment control products; and intelligent TV terminal equipment consisting of three-network fusion, intelligent system, intelligent home use, and multi-screen interactive type products. The company was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Zhangjiagang, China.

002543.SZ.long_name: Guangdong Vanward New Electric Co., Ltd.
002543.SZ.summary: Guangdong Vanward New Electric Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells kitchen appliances and hot water systems in China and internationally. It offers gas water heaters, gas cookers and stoves, disinfection cabinets, range hoods, and electric water heaters, as well as outdoor appliances and energy systems. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Foshan, China.

002577.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Rapoo Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells wired and wireless peripheral products worldwide. The company offers wired and wireless mouse and keyboards, wireless audio products, and wired and wireless combo sets. It also provides game peripherals, including game keyboards, mouse, headsets, combos, and mats, as well as gamepads. The company offers its products under the Rapoo brand. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Shenzhen, China. Shenzhen Rapoo Technology Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of MLK Electronics Limited.

002579.SZ.long_name: Huizhou China Eagle Electronic Technology Inc.
002579.SZ.summary: Huizhou China Eagle Electronic Technology Co., Ltd. researches and develops, produces, and sells printed circuit boards in China and internationally. The company's products include offers rigid and flexible circuit, multilayer, HDI, and aluminum substrate boards. Its products are used in consumer electronics, network communications, automotive electronics, security, LED displays, medical equipment, AI, IOT, AR/VR, and drones, etc. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Huizhou, China.

002583.SZ.summary: Hytera Communications Corporation Limited provides communications solutions in China and internationally. The company offers digital radio and trunking systems, LTE-broadband trunking and smart radio systems, command and dispatch systems, communication command vehicle systems, PMR-IoT and emergency response systems, satellite communications systems, sinclair antennas, and body worn cameras, as well as smart accessories, such as video and audio systems, batteries, chargers, carrying cases, car-kits, cables, antennas, and others. It serves government and public security, utility, and transportation sectors, as well as enterprises and businesses. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Haoyitong Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Hytera Communications Corporation Limited in March 2010. Hytera Communications Corporation Limited was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

002587.SZ.summary: Shenzhen AOTO Electronics Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells LED display products and solutions in China and internationally. It offers commercial LED display solutions for high-end retail and transport applications, command centers, conference halls, and broadcast studios; out of home, indoor, and outdoor LED display products; LED video controllers; rental LED display products; and software systems. AOTO Electronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

002600.SZ.summary: Lingyi Itech (Guangdong) Company develops, produces, and sells magnetic materials and products. The company offers permanent ferrite magnets, such as wet and dry anisotropic, isotropic, and rubber ferrite magnets; bonded NdFeB and sintered SmCo magnets; and Ni-Zn and Mn-Zn ferrite cores, and inductors with ferrite cores. It also offers precision components and modules, precision structural parts, liquid crystal display modules, capacitive touch screens, wires and cables, and motors. In addition, the company provides trade logistics and supply chain finance services. Its products are used in consumer electronics, automotive control, smart security, smart wear and home, new materials, new energy vehicles, and other fields. The company was founded in 1975 and is based in Jiangmen, China.

002609.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen Jieshun Science and Technology Industry Co.,Ltd.
002609.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Jieshun Science And Technology Industry Co.,Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells access control and management systems. The company offers car parking management systems and auto pay stations; ultrasonic parking guidance systems; access controllers, access control readers, and access control spare parts; pedestrian and barrier gate systems; and road blockers, as well as all-in-one card, turnstile with ESD testing, biological recognition, and card retriever solutions. It provides its products under the JSST brand. The company has operations in approximately 100 countries and areas worldwide. Shenzhen Jieshun Science And Technology Industry Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002610.SZ.long_name: Jiangsu Akcome Science and Technology Co., Ltd.
002610.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Akcome Science and Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures photovoltaic (PV) accessories; and invests in and operates power stations primarily in the People's Republic of China. The company operates, inspects, maintains, and rates 1.1GW of grid-tied clean energy power stations; sells generated power to grid companies; develops carbon assets; and operates new energy vehicles and charging piles. It also offers aluminum frameworks of polar batteries; sectional materials; PV installation racks; and PV welding strips. Jiangsu Akcome Science and Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Zhangjiagang, the People's Republic of China.

002616.SZ.summary: Guangdong Chant Group Inc. manufactures and sells thermal energy and gas appliances in China. The company offers outdoor ovens, gas valves, gas heaters, barbecue grills, gas cookers, and gas appliance parts, umbrella heaters, pressure reducing valves, plug valves, burners, and other accessories. It also produces renewable energy, such as thermoelectric and solid fuels. The company also exports its products to 36 countries. Guangdong Chant Group Inc. was founded in 1985 and is based in Zhongshan, China.

002618.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Danbond Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of flexible circuits and its materials primarily in China. The company offers FCCL single and double side substrates used in LCD monitors, LCD TVs, cameras, mobile phones, netbooks, e-books, cars, etc.; COF flexible encapsulation substrates; COF products used in LCD TVs, smart 3G phones and laptop computers, and other products with LCD display drivers; and FPC flexible printed circuit boards. It also provides encapsulation-related heat curing adhesive and micro adhesive glue films. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Shenzhen, China. Shenzhen Danbond Technology Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of Shenzhen Danbond Investment Group Co., Ltd.

002635.SZ.summary: Suzhou Anjie Technology Co., Ltd. supplies internal and external functional components for the consumer electronics industry in China and internationally. Its principal products include tapes, insulation products, buffering products, EMI products, shading tapes, thermal products, conductive products, optical films, touch panels, cover glasses, precision metal parts, etc. The company also provides die-cut products, non-metal printing and CNC products, 3D processing products, optical glass products, precise metal stampings, and energy batteries. It offers its products for smartphones, tablets, laptops, AR/VR, smart home applications, etc. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.

002642.SZ.summary: Ronglian Group Ltd. provides IT solutions in China and internationally. It provides infrastructure and data center solutions, such as IT planning, application and system integration, professional operation and maintenance, and specialized services; virtualization, and private and hybrid cloud services; and B2B, smart city, and operation services. The company also offers enterprise cloud services, such as cloud planning and design, service migration, resource management, integration development, and operation monitoring services, as well as industry cloud solutions, such as insurance, exploration, and education. In addition, it provides Internet of Vehicles ecosystem through specialized hardware and software products, business platforms, and data services; Internet of Water solution to control leakage and venting, and ensure water quality safety; big data storage, data visualization, and data application solutions; and smart news solutions. Further, the company offers bio-data platform and biological cloud, and hospital and healthcare management solutions. It serves the energy, transportation, telecom, media, finance, insurance, government, education, manufacturing, biological, and healthcare industries. The company was formerly known as UEC Group Ltd. Ronglian Group Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Beijing, China.

002649.SZ.summary: Beyondsoft Corporation provides IT consulting, solutions, and services worldwide. The company offers analytics services, such as management consulting, big data and business intelligence, and service desk; DevOps automation tool; and digital architecture and development, Web and cloud operations, interactive portfolio management, and interactive strategy services. It also provides enterprise mobility, UX design, mobile app development, and mobile testing services; and enterprise strategy and transformation, business process, digitalization, technology strategy and architecture, enterprise application, and accessibility services. In addition, the company offers product engineering, product lifecycle management, product design, software development, globalization and localization, and verification and validation services; and application development and maintenance, testing, management, and enterprise integration services. Further, it provides testing consulting and TCOE, test development and engineering, security testing, and G11N/L10N testing services; and infrastructure management services, such as architecture and deployment, managed infrastructure, operation and support, and security services. The company serves various industries, such as BFSI, technology, Internet, retail, telecom, manufacturing, automobile, media, energy, healthcare, travel, and logistics. Beyondsoft Corporation was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

002655.SZ.summary: Gettop Acoustic Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells electro-acoustic components and assemblies worldwide. It offers miniature microphones, micro speakers/receivers, and module products. The company's products are used in mobile communication devices, portable PC and flat panel TV products, personal digital devices, car kits, and other consumer electronics. It also provides electro-acoustic solutions. The company was formerly known as Shandong Gettop Acoustic Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Gettop Acoustic Co., Ltd. in October 2018. Gettop Acoustic Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Weifang, China.

002657.SZ.summary: Sinodata Co., Ltd. operates in the software and information service sector in China. The company offers financial assets transaction, Internet bank, assets management, asset securitization, credit investigation, big data and supply chain finance services; and creates third party Internet bank platform and financial asset transaction platform; and constructs Internet bank ecosphere. It serves small and medium-sized commercial banks, enterprises government, and financial institutions. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

002658.SZ.summary: Beijing SDL Technology Co.,Ltd. develops and sells environmental monitoring, environmental information system, and process analysis products in China. The company offers environmental monitoring system products, such as continuous emission, waste incineration, ambient air quality, and online monitoring systems; and process analytics system products, including gas analytics systems. It also provides infrared and explosion-proof gas, paramagnetic oxygen, and thermal conductivity analyzers; moisture and electrochemical oxygen analyzers; and particle concentration analyzers. In addition, the company offers software products. Its products are used in environmental, power, cement, iron and steel, air separation, and petrochemical industries. Beijing SDL Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

002660.SZ.summary: MOSO Power Supply Technology Co., Ltd. provides power supply solutions in China and internationally. The company offers LED drivers, such as road, industrial, and landscape lighting solutions; and switch power supply products comprising wall plugs, desktops, and bare boards. It also provides photovoltaic products, including single-phase, two-phase, and three-phase string inverters; and charging piles. MOSO Power Supply Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

002668.SZ.summary: Guangdong Homa Appliances Co., Ltd. manufactures, sells, and exports refrigerators in China and internationally. It is also involved in various activities, such as Internet lending platform, commercial factoring loans, Internet small loans, loan assistance, as well as bank Internet financial platform technology development services, etc. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Zhongshan, China.

002681.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Fenda Technology Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells hardware and integrated solutions in China. The company's principal products include electro-acoustic products, hair care products, smart wearables, wireless modules, and metal cosmetic parts for mobile devices. It also offers speakers, such as multimedia 2.1, wireless audio, TV, bookshelf, USB, and trolley speakers; in-ear and Bluetooth headphones; and audio accessories. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Baoan Fenda Industry Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shenzhen Fenda Technology Co., Ltd. in 2010. Shenzhen Fenda Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

002705.SZ.long_name: Guangdong Xinbao Electrical Appliances Holdings Co., Ltd
002705.SZ.summary: Guangdong Xinbao Electrical Appliances Holdings Co., Ltd manufactures, develops, and sells kitchen electrical appliances, home appliances, electronic components, and baby electrical appliances under the Donlim brand in China. Its products include personal care appliances, bread makers, kettles, coffee machines, toasters, stand blenders, hand mixers, hand blenders, juicers, food processor, toaster ovens, sandwich toasters, deep fryers, cooking appliances, irons, and vacuum and air purifiers. The company also exports its products to approximately 100 countries in Europe, America, Pacific Ocean, the Middle East, Southeast Asia, Africa, etc. Guangdong Xinbao Electrical Appliances Holdings Co., Ltd was founded in 1995 and is based in Foshan, China.

002729.SZ.summary: Hollyland (China) Electronics Technology Corporation Limited engages in the development, production, and marketing of circuit protection products worldwide. The company offers various products, including axial leaded fuse; low voltage fuse; radial lead fuse; SMD fuse; miniature fuse, micro fuse; new energy application fuse, such as photovoltaic fuse and electric vehicle and charger; thermal fuse; PPTC; and fuse accessories, as well as other circuit protection devices. Its products are used in communication, computer, transportation, toy, household appliance, battery, new energy resource, and other electronic power system protection applications. The company was formerly known as Xiamen Ningly Electronics Company Limited and changed its name to Hollyland (China) Electronics Technology Corporation Limited in July 2010. Hollyland (China) Electronics Technology Corporation Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Xiamen, China.

002751.SZ.summary: Shenzhen ESUN Display Co.,Ltd engages in the brand terminal exhibition, low carbon cycle exhibition, 3D printing, and virtual reality businesses in China. The company offers brand strategic planning, brand prototype design, brand profile promotion, and business chain terminal research and development services. It also provides 3D printing fundamental research services in 3D maker education, antique 3D digital protection, and Internet e-commerce 3D display fields; and human body, fluid antique 3D, 3D desktop, and face recognition 3D scanners. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002766.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Soling Industrial Co.,Ltd provides car networking hardware and software services. Its products include MWR, HUD, rear-view mirror, ADAS, DVR, back seat infotainment device, TPMS, 360 monitor, telematics, bcaking camera, full LCD cluster, MIFI, t-box, OBD, IVI, and anti-fatigue system. The company offers IVI systems for passenger car infotainment systems and commercial vehicle products; and tire pressure monitoring systems. It also provides IOV management platform for vehicle data monitoring, fault reminder, location tracking, in-car entertainment, maintenance reminder, location sharing, electric vehicle management, vehicle remote control, collision reminder, real-time detection, car friends group, address book interaction, electric vehicle international and landmark docking, and overall security management. The company offers its products to approximately 30 provinces and cities in China; and approximately 60 countries and regions in Europe, the United States, and Southeast Asia. The company offers multi-layer Internet of Things interactive metering platforms, Internet of Things interactive metering platforms, peer-to-peer interactive metering platforms, and IC card prepaid metering platforms, as well as city gas intelligent metering network charging system solutions. 002771.SZ.summary: Beijing Transtrue Technology Inc. provides information technology and integrated multimedia video solutions in the areas of energy, government, finance, transportation, education, and others in China. The company's multimedia information systems include integrated communication systems, VR simulation systems, multi-functional conference systems, remote cooperation systems, conference management systems, and dynamic environment monitoring systems; and production monitoring and emergency command systems comprise emergency plan Pcals, surveillance and warning systems, exercise systems, security systems, and command systems. It also provides consultation, design, research and development, integration, and other services; one-stop cloud data center services; and data visualization services. 002806.SZ.long_name: Guangdong Huafeng New Energy Technology Co.,Ltd.
002806.SZ.summary: Guangdong Huafeng New Energy Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells electronic aluminum foils. It also offers water treatment chemicals. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Zhaoqing, China.

002815.SZ.summary: Suntak Technology Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells printed circuit boards in China. The company offers 4-layer rigid-flexible, golden finger, backplane, heavy copper, and copper paste filling boards; HDI boards; layer, black-ink, and multilayer rigid flexible boards, as well as large panel lamination boards; double sided, single sided, and 4 layer flex boards; and multilayer boards. The company also exports its products to Europe, North America, Japan, and other Asia Pacific countries. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Suntak Circuit Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Suntak Technology Co.,Ltd. in May 2018. Suntak Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002819.SZ.summary: Beijing Oriental Jicheng Co., Ltd. offers products and solutions for test and measurement applications in China. The company serves customers in various sectors, such as industrial electronics manufacturing, telecommunications and information technology, R&D, education and scientific research, electric power, petroleum and chemical, aviation and aerospace, microelectronics, new energy, biological pharmacy and environmental protection, etc. Beijing Oriental Jicheng Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

002829.SZ.summary: Beijing StarNeto Technology Co., Ltd. provides navigation, measurement, and control products in China. It also provides satellite communications solutions, including ship loading, car moving through, portable communication stations, and airborne transmission solutions, as well as system integration services; radar products, such as security systems, wireless communication systems, and miss distance measurement radars; and infrared cameras, meteorological and underwater sound detection products, Netherlands XSENS products, and MTi products. Beijing StarNeto Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is based in Beijing, China.

002841.SZ.long_name: Guangzhou Shiyuan Electronic Technology Company Limited
002841.SZ.summary: Guangzhou Shiyuan Electronic Technology Company Limited engages in the design, development, and sale of LCD main boards, intelligent interactive panels, medical devices, and related intelligent hardware in the People's Republic of China. It also offers interactive flat panels, and software and peripheral products; smart home and automotive electronics; and artificial intelligence products, as well as corporate services. The company markets its products under the seewo and MAXHUB brand names. Its products are used in education and commercial sectors. In addition, the company offers medical devices for home and hospital use under the Xicoo brand name. Guangzhou Shiyuan Electronic Technology Company Limited was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, the People's Republic of China.

The company offers headend products, including encoders and transcoders, receivers and decoders, QAM and IPQAM products, and multiplexers and scramblers; software systems, such as conditional access systems, as well as operation and value added systems; cable, terrestrial, satellite, hybrid, IPTV/OTT, and DTH/DTT FTA set-top boxes; and RF and IP/ASI multiviewers. It also provides DTT transmitters, exciters and SFN adapters, peripherals, antenna systems, and centralized monitoring products; FM transmitters and microwave links; xPON solutions for OTT and related video-on-demand services of broadcasting and television operator networks; satellite TVRO antennas; C band and Ku band LNB products; and Ka-band and Ku-Band SATCOM antennas. In addition, the company offers home security products comprising wireless kits, digital surveillance cameras, and baby monitor cameras; intelligent nursing products, including Wi-Fi, doorbell, and 360 degree VR cameras, as well as bicycle rearview mirrors; integrated and Wi-Fi inspection tools; and RF components, such as ceramic resonators, RF copper-clade plates, and ceramic satellite positioning antennas. Further, it provides content protection, DTV+OTT, DTH and DTT turnkey, FTTx, and video distribution solutions; and systems engineering construction and technical services. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

002861.SZ.summary: YingTong Telecommunication Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, marketing, and servicing of telecommunication wire and electroacoustic products. The company offers finished headphone products, semi-finished earphone products, headphone wires, enameling stranded wires and enameled copper wires, flat wires and special shaped cables, headsets, USB data cables, smart bracelets, and other products, as well as TPE and LVDS series, coaxial cables, and PVC plastic compounds. It has operations in China, the United States, Japan, England, Germany, South Korea, Thailand, Vietnam, India, Singapore, Malaysia, Hong Kong, Taiwan, and internationally. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Tongcheng, China.

002866.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Transimage Technology Co., Ltd. researches, produces, and sells flexible circuit boards, notebook computer accessories, insulation conductive materials, and rubber and other products in China. It also provides MEM, touch pad, and film printed circuit products. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Gaoyou, China.

002870.SZ.long_name: Guangdong Senssun Weighing Apparatus Group Ltd.
002870.SZ.summary: Guangdong Senssun Weighing Apparatus Group Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of medium- to high-end weighing apparatuses for home and commercial use, and health and movement measurement products. It operates through Measuring Devices, Weighing Apparatuses, and Health and Movement Information Measurement Products segments. The company's products include price computing scales, electronic platform scales, digital weighing scales, dial spring scales, weighing indicators, smart personal scales, activity trackers, baby scales, body analyzers, kitchen scales, body fat scales, luggage scales, and health monitor scales. It operates in China, Europe, North America, and Southeast Asia. Guangdong Senssun Weighing Apparatus Group Ltd. sells its products through a network of own stores, electronic channels, and retail chains, as well as direct selling facilities. The company was formerly known as Senssun Weighing Apparatus Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Guangdong Senssun Weighing Apparatus Group Ltd. in January 2008. Guangdong Senssun Weighing Apparatus Group Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Zhongshan, China.

002881.SZ.summary: MeiG Smart Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of Internet of Things terminals and wireless communication modules and solutions worldwide. The company's products include smart terminals, 5G and 4G LTE modules, NB-IoT Modules, smart, and automotive modules; and wireless data solutions for use in smart positioning and tracking, payment methods for retailers, blind spot monitoring driving, logistics, and alarm solutions in energy fields. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen MeiG Smart Technology Co., Ltd and changed its name to MeiG Smart Technology Co., Ltd. in December 2017. MeiG Smart Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

The company offers chargers, power adapters, customized power supplies, and smart power converters; high and low frequency transformers, filters, inductors, potting components, and others; and three phase transformers and specialized reactors. Its products are primarily used in various applications, such as home appliance, consumer electronic, UPS power application, LED lightings, telecom, PV inverter, etc. Shenzhen JingQuanHua Electronics Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

The company was formerly known as Guangzhou du xi electric co., ltd. HiVi Acoustics Technology Co., Ltd was founded in 1991 and is based in Guangzhou, China.

002902.SZ.long_name: Dongguan Mentech Optical & Magnetic Co., Ltd.

It also provides magnetic components, such as telecom and power magnetic components and multilayer inductance; and consumer power supply products comprising adapters and chargers. The company's products are used in the access network, backbone, metro, fiber optic switch, fiber optic transceiver, digital television, optical communication, motherboard, network switch, router, set-top box, and network data communication industries. 002908.SZ.summary: Guangdong Tecsun Science & Technology Co.,Ltd. provides information system construction and related operational services for human society, employment, finance, medical care, big data, etc. It offers social security card production and issuance, application environment construction, and operation services, as well as social security card solutions and card making services. The company also provides personal services, such as employment, subsidy issuance, and cards replacement services. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.

It also provides technical solution consulting services; project implementation supporting services; remote technical support services; onsite fault handling technical services; technical material services; software upgrade services; network regular inspection services; onsite duty support services; and technical training services. Its products are used in computer, consumer electronics, communications equipment, automotive electronics, industrial control and medical electronics, and other fields. The company was formerly known as Aoshikang Technology (Yiyang) Co., Ltd. Aoshikang Technology Co., Ltd was founded in 2005 and is based in Yiyang, China.

002916.SZ.summary: Shennan Circuit Company Limited designs, manufactures, and sells printed circuit boards, packaging substrates, and electronic assemblies in China and internationally. The company was formerly known as CATIC Shenzhen Shennan Circuit Company and changed its name to Shennan Circuit Company Limited in January 2000. 002925.SZ.summary: Xiamen Intretech Inc. designs, produces, and sells intelligent control components, consumer electronic products, and intelligent manufacturing solutions in China and internationally. It offers smart factory solutions; smart home solutions, such as smart security, lighting, player, energy saving, and environment solutions; and smart vehicle products. The company offers atomic clocks, crystal components, RF/MW modules, frequency assemblies and modules, time synchronization systems, etc., as well as Bei Dou satellite applications. Its products are used in communication, consumer electronic and computer, and automotive electronics and industrial control industries. 002947.SZ.long_name: Suzhou Hengmingda Electronic Technology Co., Ltd.
002947.SZ.summary: Suzhou Hengmingda Electronic Technology Co., Ltd. primarily engages in the design, research and development, production, and sale of consumer electronic functional devices. 002953.SZ.long_name: GuangDong Rifeng Electric Cable Co., Ltd.

002955.SZ.summary: Hitevision Co., Ltd. develops and manufactures multi-media audio visual solutions worldwide. The company offers unified collaboration solutions, such as InGlassTM, PCAP, and infrared touch technology solutions, as well as integration of audio and video, and stylish design fits; interactive education solutions; and OC module and optical bonding technology solutions. 002962.SZ.long_name: Hubei W-olf Photoelectric Technology Co., Ltd.
002962.SZ.summary: Hubei W-olf Photoelectric Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of precision photoelectric film components in China. Haoersai Technology Group Corp., Ltd. is headquartered in Beijing, China.

002983.SZ.summary: Anhui Coreach Technology Co.,Ltd engages in the research and development, production, and sale of display photoelectric and health intelligent light source systems. It also offers BPO services related to credit card and loan credit verification, data entry, business processing, business marketing, cash business, lobby service, file outsourcing, bank card business, e-commerce operation, financial sharing processing, call service processing, human resources outsourcing, insurance business, process banking business centralized processing, and e-banking auxiliary processing. 002990.SZ.summary: Maxvision Technology Corp. engages in artificial intelligence, algorithm research, and system integration activities in China. It offers port, smart transportation, and smart systems. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

002992.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Baoming Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of LED backlight modules and capacitive touch screens of small and medium size flat panel display devices in China. Its LED backlight modules are used in mobile phones, as well as other small and medium size displays, such as GPS and digital cameras; and capacitive touch screens are used in mobile phones and tablet PCs. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Beijing, China.

003007.SZ.summary: Beijing ZZNode Technologies Co., Ltd., a software company, provides telecommunications and IT operation management products and solutions in China. It primarily offers telecom operation support software and services. The company serves radio and television, railway, financial, and other industries. Beijing ZZNode Technologies Co., Ltd. was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

003026.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Zhongjing Technologies.Inc engages in the manufacturing and selling of crystalline silicon and electronic components in China. The company provides semiconductor wafers and silicon rods The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Changxing, China.

003028.SZ.summary: Genbyte Technology Inc. manufactures and sells controllers for use in household appliances, industrial inverters, and power supply and automotive products in China. It offers refrigerator controllers, inverter air-conditioner controllers, washing machine controllers, controllers for kitchen and bath appliances, controllers for small appliances, automotive refrigerator and air-conditioner controllers, controllers for switch mode power supplies, remote controllers, controllers for industrial inverter, FPC controllers, and high voltage power supply products. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

003029.SZ.long_name: Jilin University Zhengyuan Information Technologies Co., Ltd.
003029.SZ.summary: Jilin University Zhengyuan Information Technologies Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of information security products in China. It primarily offers electronic invoicing platform, as well as security consulting, security integration, and industrial application development services. The company also provides security compliance requirements in the process of electronic invoicing, delivery, inspection, reimbursement, and accounting. Jilin University Zhengyuan Information Technologies Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Beijing, China.

003040.SZ.summary: Chutian Dragon Co., Ltd. production, sale, and service of professional smart card and relevant application platform system or terminal equipment. It offers cards related to USIM card, scratch/refill/recharge cards, M2M IOT SIM card, MasterCard cards, UnionPay card, social security ID card, transportation cards, VISA cards, Magstripe cards, special card, consultation service terminals, card service terminals, self-service terminals, counter service terminals, mobile service terminals, and biometric card. It serves telecom communication, social security, finance, transportation, identity recognition, digital television, and other industries in Europe, America, Southeast Asia, and Africa. The company was formerly known as Guangdong Chutian Dragon Smart Card Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Chutian Dragon Co., Ltd. in 2018. Chutian Dragon Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Dongguan City, China.

0268.HK.long_name: Kingdee International Software Group Company Limited
0268.HK.summary: Kingdee International Software Group Company Limited, an investment holding company, engages in enterprise resource planning business. The company operates through ERP Business, Cloud Services Business, and Investment Properties Operating Business segments. The ERP Business segment sells software and hardware products; and provides software solution consulting, maintenance, upgrade, and other supporting services, as well as software implementation services. The Cloud Services Business segment provides enterprise, finance, industry, and other cloud services. The Investment Properties Operating Business segment invests in properties. The company also develops, designs, manufactures, and sells hardware products; provides software-related and online financial services; and develops Internet and online pay technologies. It serves enterprises, government agencies, and other organizations worldwide. Kingdee International Software Group Company Limited was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.

0285.HK.summary: BYD Electronic (International) Company Limited, an investment holding company, designs, manufactures, assembles, and sells mobile handset components and modules in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company also provides high level assembly services; and manufactures and sells batteries, chargers, and iron phosphate batteries for use in electric buses, trucks, cars, and forklifts, as well as its components and spare parts. In addition, it builds and maintains monorail projects. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China. BYD Electronic (International) Company Limited is a subsidiary of Golden Link Worldwide Limited.

0334.HK.long_name: China Display Optoelectronics Technology Holdings Limited
0334.HK.summary: China Display Optoelectronics Technology Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the research, development, manufacture, distribution, and sale of liquid crystal display modules for mobile phones and tablets in Mainland China, Hong Kong, Turkey, Thailand, South Korea, and Taiwan. It is also involved in the development and sale of software, and provision of technical consultancy services. The company was formerly known as TCL Display Technology Holdings Limited and changed its name to China Display Optoelectronics Technology Holdings Limited in January 2017. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in HuiZhou, the People's Republic of China. China Display Optoelectronics Technology Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of High Value Ventures Limited.

0354.HK.summary: Chinasoft International Limited, together with its subsidiaries, develops and provides information technology (IT) solutions, IT outsourcing, and training services. It operates through Technical Professional Services Group and Internet IT Services Group segments. The company offers CloudEasy, a cloud management platform; Huaxia Cloud, a cloud brokerage platform; Tencent Cloud that provides cloud consultation, migration, operation and maintenance management, and application development and integration; enterprise cloud disk; and cloud shop O2O platform, as well as ResourceOne, TopLink/TSA+, and Ark big data middleware platforms. It also provides IT application development and maintenance, IT testing, infrastructure management, product development and services, digital consulting and implementation, system integration and services, IT consulting and outsourcing, business process outsourcing, and other customer services. In addition, the company offers Internet IT services comprising software industry Internet platform, SaaS, and shared services; and trades in software and hardware products. It serves financial institution, banks, insurance and securities, retail, telecommunications and Internet, high-technology business, manufacturing, transportation, public utilities, and other industries, as well as to the government in the People's Republic of China, the United States, Japan, Malaysia, India, and internationally. The company was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

0400.HK.summary: Cogobuy Group operates as an e-commerce company serving the electronics manufacturing industry in the People's Republic of China and Hong Kong. It sells integrated circuits and other electronic components comprising microcontrollers/processors, sensors and converters, signal and interface products, amplifiers, filters, optoelectronic devices, resistors, inductors, discrete devices, connectors, switches, relays, circuit protection devices, development tools and systems, multimedia ICs, and dedicated and motor control ICs, as well as FPGA/CPLD, DSP, memory, wireless and RF, power management, capacitance, timer, and clock products. The company offers its products through its e-commerce platform, cogobuy.com, which includes a direct sales platform, as well as through an online marketplace, and a team of technical consultants and professional sales representatives. It also provides media communication and collaboration platforms and solutions; supply chain financing services; and develops e-commerce software technology. In addition, the company develops and sells electronic communication products; operates the INGDAN.com platform; and holds Internet content provider license. It serves electronics manufacturers, including small and medium enterprise, and blue-chip customers. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China. Cogobuy Group is a subsidiary of Envision Global Investments Limited.

0438.HK.long_name: IRICO Group New Energy Company Limited
0438.HK.summary: IRICO Group New Energy Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the solar photovoltaic, modules and power station, and other businesses in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It researches, develops, produces, and sells solar photovoltaic glasses, solar cells, and components. The company also constructs and operates solar photovoltaic power stations. In addition, it is involved in the production and sale of inorganic nonmetallic materials and products. The company was formerly known as IRICO Group Electronics Company Limited and changed its name to IRICO Group New Energy Company Limited in January 2016. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Xianyang, the People's Republic of China.

0465.HK.summary: Futong Technology Development Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides enterprise information technology (IT) infrastructure products, services, and solutions; cloud computing products; and intelligent digitalized application products in the People's Republic of China and Hong Kong. It also offers system integration services. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China. Futong Technology Development Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of China Group Associates Limited.

0553.HK.summary: Nanjing Panda Electronics Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the development, manufacture, and sale of electronic equipment, electronic computer fitting, office machinery, and tooling products in the People's Republic of China. The company operates through Smart City Industry, Electronic Manufacturing Service, Intelligent Manufacturing Industry, and Others segments. It offers radio communication equipment, radio and television equipment, hardware and electrical equipment, electronic components, instrument and apparatus, electrical machinery, standard and electrical machinery, and medical equipment products. The company manufactures and sells automatic transmission equipment and industrial robots; railway transit auto fare collection (AFC) and AFC clearing center system equipment, building intellectualization products, and system integration; and mobile communications, digital communications, and network communication systems and products. It also manufactures general purpose equipment, communications equipment, and digital products, as well as provides software development, property management, and catering services. The company was founded in 1936 and is based in Nanjing, the People's Republic of China.

0696.HK.summary: TravelSky Technology Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides information technology solutions for aviation and travel industry in the People's Republic of China. It primarily offers aviation information technology (AIT), distribution information technology, accounting, settlement, and clearing services. The company's AIT services consist of electronic travel distribution services, including inventory control system, computer reservation system, and airport passenger processing system services, as well as other related information technology solutions. It also provides cargo management services, as well as sells and installs related information systems; computer hardware and software development, and data network services; and computer system engineering design and installation services. TravelSky Technology Limited was incorporated in 2000 and is based in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

0712.HK.summary: Comtec Solar Systems Group Limited, an investment holding company, researches, produces, and sells mono-crystalline solar wafers and ingots in the People's Republic of China and Malaysia. The company operates through Upstream, and Downstream Solar and Power Storage segments. It offers solar grade products, such as pseudo square bricks, wafers, and polysilicon products. The company also invests in, develops, constructs, and operates solar photovoltaic power stations; and researches and develops, designs, integrates, and sells lithium battery management and battery systems to electric vehicle and lithium battery manufacturers, and power storage companies. In addition, it trades in solar related parts, equipment, and products; and generates solar power. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China. Comtec Solar Systems Group Limited is a subsidiary of Fonty Holdings Limited.

0763.HK.summary: ZTE Corporation provides integrated telecommunications and information technology (IT) solutions worldwide. It operates through three segments: Carriers' Networks, Government and Corporate Business, and Consumer Business. The company offers wireless products, such as baseband units, AAU series, ultra-broadband radio series, indoor coverage, small cell base station series, and microwave products. It also provides cloud core network products that comprise hardware devices, cloud platform systems; HD voice and video, intelligent pipeline, and user data convergence; CloudStudio GSO, NFVO, and VNFM; and cloud integration products. In addition, the company offers fixed network services, including optical and copper access, and smart home products; transport network, such as optical network, mobile backhaul, router, Ethernet switch, and network control and management systems; multi-media solutions; energy solutions comprise telecom power and data centre; and data management solutions. Further, it provides cloud computing products that include cloud platform, storage, and desktop products; cloud video products, such as video conferencing and IoT platform, contact centre, coalition emergency response systems, and meeting infrastructure; and smart phone and mobile internet products, as well as 5G, consulting and integration, technical, digital operation, intelligent O&M customer support, and learning services. Additionally, the company offers wireless access, cloud core and transport network, fixed access, and AI and bigdata solutions. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.

0909.HK.long_name: Ming Yuan Cloud Group Holdings Limited
0909.HK.summary: Ming Yuan Cloud Group Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides software solutions for property developers in the People's Republic of China. It offers enterprise resource planning (ERP) solutions and Software as a Service (SaaS) products for property developers and other real estate industry participants, such as construction materials suppliers and property asset management companies to manage a range of business operations, including sales and marketing, procurement, cost management, project management, budgeting, and property asset management. The company sells and delivers ERP solutions and SaaS products through direct sales force and a network of regional channel partners. Ming Yuan Cloud Group Holdings Limited was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.

0968.HK.summary: Xinyi Solar Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, produces and sells solar glass products in the People's Republic of China, Malaysia, and internationally. It operates through three segments: Sales of Solar Glass; Solar Farm Business; and Engineering, Procurement and Construction Services. The company offers photovolatic power station, ultraclear patterned glasses, back glasses, and AR photovoltaic glasses, as well as double glass modules. It also develops and operates solar farms; and provides engineering, procurement, and construction services.
