300290.SZ.long_name: Bringspring Science and Technology Co., Ltd.
300290.SZ.summary: Bringspring Science and Technology Co., Ltd. focuses on health data and cloud services in China. It provides cloud computing, big data, Internet of Things, and artificial intelligence services. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Shenyang, China.

300292.SZ.summary: Wutong Holding Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of wireless communication RF connection systems and fiber connection products. The company provides communication connection products for RF and fiber connection fields, as well as mobile communication terminal devices. It offers wireless communication RF connection system products, which primarily include RF coaxial connectors, adaptors, surge arrestors, cables and cable assemblies, and interconnect devices, such as terminal loads, as well as related connection structure parts. The company also provides optic-electric products, including optical splitters, optical fiber patch cords, optical cables, optical fiber connectors, and boxes. In addition, it offers communication antennas. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Wutong Communications Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Wutong Holding Group Co., Ltd. in October 2015. Wutong Holding Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Suzhou, China.

300296.SZ.summary: Leyard Optoelectronic Co., Ltd. designs, produces, distributes, and services digital displays, video walls, and visualization products worldwide. The company offers LED video walls, LCD video walls, large format LCD displays, processors and players, 4K LCD displays, rear projection video walls, touch displays, accessories, and custom displays, as well as LED display products for rental and staging applications. It serves control room, corporate, digital signage, hospitality, oil and gas, retail, broadcast, higher education, healthcare, museums, sports and entertainment, government, rental and staging, and house of worship markets. The company was formerly known as Beijing Leyard Electronics Technology Co Ltd. Leyard Optoelectronic Co., Ltd. has a strategic partnership with Lighthouse Technologies Ltd. for providing a range of sports venue display solutions. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

300297.SZ.summary: Bluedon Information Security Technologies Co.,Ltd. provides information security solutions in China. The company offers physical and industrial control, network and application, cloud computing and big data, mobile, risk monitor and security management, e-commerce and individual, urban emergency and production emergency, and secrecy security products. It serves government, education, military, emergency response, telecommunication, finance, energy, transportation, health care, and manufacturing sectors. Bluedon Information Security Technologies Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Guangzhou, China.

300300.SZ.summary: Strait Innovation Internet Co., Ltd. engages in the design, consultation, and implementation of intelligent and information system integration projects in China. The company's activities include analysis of the overall framework of smart cities; smart city research planning and project consulting; smart city platform construction and development implementation; smart city service outsourcing and operation and maintenance; smart city integrated services; smart city overall contract; and internet financial ecosystem. It also provides smart medical services, such as remote consultation, medical technology, medical management, medical investment, medical insurance, and chronic disease management services; and engages in the strategic investment activities. The company was formerly known as Hakim Unique Internet Co., Ltd. Strait Innovation Internet Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

300302.SZ.summary: Toyou Feiji Electronics Co., Ltd. provides data storage infrastructure solutions in China. The company offers flash memory, autonomous and controllable, cloud computing, enterprise and distributed storage, storage network, and data protection products. It also provides video cloud, active storage, and database acceleration solutions. The company serves finance, transportation, medical, education, and energy industries, as well as government, military, industrial, and research institutes. Toyou Feiji Electronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

300303.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Jufei Optoelectronics Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of SMD LED devices in China, South Korea, Japan, India, Turkey, and internationally. The company offers backlight LED devices, lighting LED, display, automotive, and flash LED devices, as well as backlight LED modules, optical film, and TO-CAN products. Its products are used in various applications, such as mobile communications, liquid crystal display, lighting, automotive electronics and lighting, screen displays, Nixie tube, and other electrical appliances. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

300306.SZ.summary: HangZhou Everfine Photo-e-info Co., Ltd. provides LED and lighting measurement instruments to institutes, laboratories, and corporations in China. It offers spectroradiometers, goniophotometers, LED aging-life test system, LED thermal analysis system, optical radiation safety system, start-time and flicker test, illuminance and UV irradiance meter, automotive and traffic light, test accessories, and automated online testing equipment. The company also provides smartphone and tablet, liquid crystal display, TV, OLED, LED display, vehicle and airborne display, backlight and LCM module, and projector measurement systems; optical instruments for luminance and color measurement; and standard luminance and chromaticity sources. In addition, it offers spectrophotometers, glossmeters, haze meters, test systems for transmittance and reflectance, and standard light source boxes. Further, the company provides ultraviolet irradiance meters, ultraviolet spectrometers, ultraviolet inspection devices, UV standard light sources, and ultraviolet radiant intensity distribution test systems. Additionally, it offers EMS and EMI test systems; shielded room and anechoic chambers; digital power meters; accurate power supply products; electronic ballast and components analyzers; and test and calibration services. The company also exports its products to the United States, Europe, Japan, and other countries and regions. HangZhou Everfine Photo-e-info Co., Ltd. is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

300310.SZ.summary: Eastone Century Technology Co.,Ltd. provides communication network technology services and system solutions to telecom operators and equipment manufacturers in China. The company offers engineering, construction, maintenance, optimization, and other technical services for communication, wireless, transmission, and other networks; integrated, business support, and IT system solutions; tag analytics big data services; and communications big data business identification services. It also engages in the research and development of communication equipment; and production and sales business. The company was formerly known as Guangdong Eastone Century Technology Co.,Ltd. Eastone Century Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Guangzhou, China.

300311.SZ.summary: Surfilter Network Technology Co., Ltd. provides network information security solutions in China and internationally. The company offers user entity behavior awareness solution to control and manage Internet usage. It also provides firewall, anti-virus gateway, video surveillance security gateway, intrusion prevention, unknown threat protection gateway, intrusion detection, application delivery, and security isolation and information exchange systems. In addition, the company offers network security situation awareness solutions, Website security monitoring systems, and mobile Internet application security management platforms; operation and maintenance security audit systems; network security audit, log management integrated audit, database auditing, and public area wireless Internet information security management systems; and public opinion security solutions. It serves management companies, network operators, enterprises, public institutions, and individuals. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300312.SZ.summary: Boomsense Technology Co.,Ltd. provides wireless broadband access solutions in China. The company provides distributed, dual carrier, enterprise, outdoor, and small cell systems; multiservice distributed access system solutions, repeater series products, micro power distribution systems, and base station amplifiers; and passive devices and point of interfaces. It also offers wireless access point controllers, access points, wireless bridges, and wireless base stations; indoor antennas, base station antennas, camouflage antennas, and camouflage shells; electricity security products; and gateway terminals. Boomsense Technology Co., Ltd. is based in Beijing, China.

300316.SZ.long_name: Zhejiang Jingsheng Mechanical & Electrical Co., Ltd.
300316.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Jingsheng Mechanical & Electrical Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of semiconductor equipment and LED substrate material. The company provides automatic crystal growing furnaces; silicon float zone crystal pullers; semiconductor mono-crystalline silicon truncating, semiconductor single and full automatic crystal ingot rolling and grinding integrated, full automatic 8-inch semiconductor wafer polishing, 32B double-sided grinding, semiconductor silicon ingot diamond wire truncating, and semiconductor single crystal silicon polishing machines; semiconductor valves and fittings; magnetic fluid vacuum sealing devices; semiconductor silicon polishing fluid; and semiconductor synthetic sand quartz crucible. It also offers automatic crystal growing, multi-crystalline silicon, and CFZ float zone silicon monocrystal furnaces; silicon block chamfering and grinding integrated, silicon block and silicon ingot single diamond wire cutting, silicon ingot squaring and grinding integrated, silicon diamond wire cutting, crystal ingot single wire squaring, and monocrystal rounding and grinding machines; stringers; and PECVD products. In addition, the company provides sapphire crystal products; fully automatic sapphire crystal growth furnaces; sapphire cutters, grinders, mounters, and substrates; sapphire truncating, automatic crystal rounding and grinding, and automatic sapphire chemical polishing machines; and customized optical panels. Further, it offers module automatic, poly-crystalline silicon ingot prosessing automatic, automatic battery, and LED bulb lamp automatic production line products; and unmanned polishing workshop and mono-crystalline silicon ingot auto testing line products. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Shaoxing, China.

300319.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Microgate Technology Co., Ltd. operates in the multilayer passive component industry worldwide. The company engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of LTCC RF components, chip inductors, EMI/EMC components, power inductors, and NFC antennas, as well as chip circuit protect and coil components, molding products, wirewound power inductors, SAW filters and duplexers, and chip EMC components. Its products are used in DVD players, mobile phones, personal computers, flat panel displays, car carriers, MP3s and MP4s, GPS systems, and other consumptive manufactures, as well as wireless, digital product, LCD/LED TV and monitor, and other applications. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300322.SZ.summary: Huizhou Speed Wireless Technology Co.,Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, sells, and services wireless communication terminal antennas for mobile phone, tablet, wearable device, notebook computer, automobile, drone, security monitoring, and other applications. It offers mobile smart terminal antennas, vehicle-mounted electronic products, wireless charging products, fingerprint and sensor modules, advanced semiconductor-packaging products, precision structural parts, and testing and intelligent detection equipment. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Huizhou, China.

300323.SZ.summary: HC SemiTek Corporation researches, develops, produces, and sells light emitting diode (LED) epitaxial wafers and chips in China. It offers full color series of LED wafer and chips used in full-color LED display screens, back light, illumination, etc. The company also provides monocrystalline sapphire, sapphire substrate, and other sapphire window materials; and integrated magnetic sensor and magnetic module solutions. The company was formerly known as Wuhan HC SemiTek Co., Ltd and changed its name to HC SemiTek Corporation. HC SemiTek Corporation was founded in 2005 and is based in Wuhan, China.

300330.SZ.long_name: ShangHai Huahong Jitong Smart System Co., Ltd.
300330.SZ.summary: ShangHai Huahong Jitong Smart System Co., Ltd. designs, develops, integrates, produces, sells, and services non-contact IC card machine products in China. The company offers rail transit systems, such as central and station computer systems. It also provides community card systems; bus card systems; and electronic ticketing solutions. In addition, the company offers intelligent supply chain management solutions. ShangHai Huahong Jitong Smart System Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is based in Shanghai, China.

300338.SZ.long_name: Kaiyuan Education Technology Group Co., Ltd.
300338.SZ.summary: Kaiyuan Education Technology Group Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells mechanical samplers, sample preparation equipment, and analytical instruments for coal and coke, alternative fuel, food and feed, and environmental applications in the People's Republic of China. It offers calorimeters; and C/H/N elemental, nitrogen/protein, fluorine/chlorine, mercury, sulfur carbon, infrared sulfur, proximate, volatile matter, moisture, and online analyzers, as well as muffle furnaces, and moisture and drying ovens. The company also provides ash fusion determinators, coking coal indices determinators, and hardgrove grindability index testers, as well as spare parts. In addition, offers sample preparation equipment comprising sample preparation systems, pulverizers, sample dividers, sieving shakers, and assisting tools, as well as hammer, jaw, and double roller crushers; and mechanical samplers include cross-belt, and railway and road wagon samplers, and online sample preparation systems. Further, the company provides management and robotic intelligent laboratory systems. The company also exports its products to approximately 60 countries, such as Indonesia, Vietnam, South Africa, Mexico, the Philippines, Thailand, South Korea, Malaysia, Burma, Laos, Australia, India, Ukraine, and the European Union. The company was formerly known as Changsha Kaiyuan Instruments Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Kaiyuan Education Technology Group Co., Ltd. in December 2020. Kaiyuan Education Technology Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Changsha, the People's Republic of China.

300339.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Hoperun Software Co., Ltd. provides software and IT services in China, Japan, Southeast Asia, North America, and internationally. It offers software solutions in the areas of software lifecycle management, bank resource management, and big data application services. The company's financial IT system products include business hub platform, a platform that provides enterprise level operational capabilities for the banking industry; ICredit Alert Wisdom, an alert system that predicts risk; big data ODS platform; precision marketing recommendation system, a customer centric marketing model; business integration platform; channel integration platform; project asset management and control platform; and events cloud platform. It also provides intelligent trading command system; Internet distributed core; performance monitoring and analysis platform; financial organization based on big data analysis platform; retail marketing management platform; and financial IT core system solution. Jiangsu Hoperun Software Co., Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Nanjing, China.

300346.SZ.long_name: Jiangsu Nata Opto-electronic Material Co., Ltd.
300346.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Nata Opto-electronic Material Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the development, production, and sale of electronic materials in China. Its products include MO source series products, ALD/CVD precursor product, electronic special gas series products, and photoresist and supporting material series products. Jiangsu Nata Opto-electronic Material Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.

300348.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Sunline Tech Co., Ltd. operates as a banking software and technology services company worldwide. It offers core banking, digital banking, credit risk management, and bank card business solutions, as well as financial big data analytics and total value management systems. The company also provides a range of services, such as IT planning and consultation, IT operations and maintenance, banking system tests, hardware installation and migration, and training services. It offers its solutions to banks, insurance companies, and unit trusts. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300352.SZ.summary: Beijing VRV Software Corporation Limited develops and sells information security products and solutions in China. The company provides data applications, mobile management systems, domestic and virtual terminal security systems, boundary security products, Intranet security products, anti-virus products, Internet security aggregation channels, and data security products. It serves the government, military, public security, finance, energy, and other industries. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

300353.SZ.summary: Kyland Technology Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells industrial Ethernet products in China and internationally. The company offers industrial Ethernet solutions, including layer 3 backbone, rackmount, DIN in rail, un-managed, EN50155, ITS, PoE, video surveillance, and intrinsic safety Ethernet switches; industrial Ethernet modules; network management software; serial device servers; optical fiber converters; SFP modules; accessories; multi-function switching platforms; and Profinet switches. It also provides industrial communication chips/bus chips; industrial Internet OS/cloud platforms; and edge computing servers, such as industrial, traffic, and power servers. In addition, the company offers intelligent terminals comprising intelligent gateways and switch all-in-one devices; redundant network solutions; timing solutions that include time servers, time distributors, time convertors, and time test analyzers; and smart city and energy Internet products. Its products are used in the power, rail, oil and gas, and automation markets. The company is based in Beijing, China.

300354.SZ.long_name: Jiangsu DongHua Testing Technology Co., Ltd.
300354.SZ.summary: Jiangsu DongHua Testing Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells structural mechanics performance test systems in China. The company also provides structural mechanics performance tests, such as multi-channel dynamic signal test and analysis systems, stress strain test analysis systems, portable test analysis systems, signal analysis systems, rugged dynamic signal test and analysis systems, wireless signal test and analysis systems, isolated signal test and analysis systems, bridge modal test systems, online monitoring and analysis systems, experimental teaching systems, modal excitation systems, and accessory products. It also offers software products, which include basic analysis, engineering application, order analysis, acoustic analysis, modal analysis, bridge analysis, and secondary development modules, as well as online monitoring software platform. In addition, the company provides sensor products, such as speed, strain, and pressure sensors; accelerometers; motion detectors; and force hammers. Its products are used in scientific research, testing, teaching, equipment manufacturing, and other fields. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Jingjiang, China.

300356.SZ.summary: EleFirst Science & Technology Co., Ltd. provides information collection systems in China and internationally. It offers smart grid products, such as electricity information collection system solutions, energy management systems, micro grid systems, distribution network automation system solutions, substation automation system solutions, tools, and other solutions. The company also provides health management solutions, including mobile services for medical authorities, hospitals, government communities, communication operators, radio and television networks, enterprises and institutions, and general public. In addition, it offers copyright cloud platforms, such as national digital audiovisual broadcasting service supervision platform and China international digital intellectual property monitoring and protection platform. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Nanjing, China.

300365.SZ.summary: Beijing Forever Technology Co., Ltd. provides smart grid solutions and services in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company offers full life cycle informatization solutions, such as research and development of resource platform, geographic resources platform, and enterprise integrated service platform; electric planning and consultation, and power investigation and surveying solutions; and engineering, procurement, and construction (EPC) solutions for power transmission and transformation. It also provides new energy power generation solutions, including pre-planning, survey, and design, as well as EPC solutions; smart transportation solutions comprising off-site overweight and oversize enforcement, and cloud based overweight and oversized vehicle detecting systems, as well as bridge health monitoring vehicle axle load monitoring subsystem; and traffic survey system. In addition, the company offers electricity sale solutions, including investment and financing, consulting, network construction, professional operation, information technology, and value-added services; water resources and hydropower ICT solutions; mountain flood disaster monitoring and early warning system; unmanned aerial vehicle emergency command and control system; and energy saving and environmental protection solutions. Further, it provides smart conference rooms, online education and training systems, and engineering 3D visualization application solutions; and operates Forever, a cloud service platform that provides informatization products and SaaS services for various industries. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

300369.SZ.summary: Nsfocus Information Technology Co., Ltd. provides Internet and application security services worldwide. It offers holistic, carrier-grade, hybrid distributed denial of service (DDoS), and Web security solutions. The company's products include anti-DDoS system, an appliance for the real-time mitigation of DDoS attacks; Cloud DDoS Protection Service, a service for service providers that defeats DDoS attacks, which impact infrastructure; Threat Intelligence Subscription Service, a service that minimizes risk and enhances overall security postures; and Attack Threat Monitoring for DDoS threat analyses and assessments, as well as Exposed Internet Surface Analysis and Cloud Web Vulnerability Scanning Service. It also provides Web Application Firewall, which protects Web servers and applications in defending against the attacks and data breaches, as well as helps in eliminating downtime; and Web Vulnerability Scanning System that helps in securing Website and identifying real vulnerabilities. In addition, the company offers Threat Analysis and Next Generation Intrusion Prevention Systems to detect and mitigate advanced persistent threats. Its solutions include cloud-in-a-box for local and regional service providers; on-premises defenses for managing DDoS services; and Hybrid DDoS Defenses for eliminating various DDoS attacks targeting customers and infrastructure. It serves telecom carriers, data centers, financial services companies, cloud service providers, managed security services providers, and enterprises. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

300370.SZ.summary: Beijing Etrol Technologies Co., Ltd. manufactures smart industry, automation, and oil and gas products and solutions in China. The company offers distributed control systems, remote terminal units, expansion I/O products, and instruments, as well as specialized industrial products for the intelligent production and development in the oilfield, granary, environment protection, and chemical industries. It also delivers supervisory control and data acquisition, safety instrumented, fire and gas, emergency shutdown, security monitoring, and dispatching systems. In addition, the company offers oil and gas ground devices; products for measurement while drilling; and natural gas processing, and environmental protection in oil and gas, as well as integrated drilling and completion, and fracturing services. Further, it provides three-dimensional ecological monitoring network and application platform for dynamic data; integrated solutions to customers in informationalized and intelligent, and grain storage and transportation industries; and multi-purpose monitoring and control systems. Additionally, it provides technologies of Internet of Things, cloud computing and related equipment, communication technology and relevant products, intelligent manufacturing, etc., as well as smart campus and intelligent water products. The company also offers oil and gas field, water and waste water, city gas, coal bed methane, oil production technology, EPC, and smart park and city solutions. In addition, it provides operation and maintenance, technical consultation, investment, engineering design and system integration, solution and implementation, construction, equipment installation and commissioning, spare parts management, and performance and upgradation services. The company was formerly known as Beijing ECHO Technologies Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Beijing Etrol Technologies Co., Ltd. in February 2015. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Beijing, China.

300371.SZ.summary: Huizhong Instrumentation Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of ultrasonic heat meters, water meters, flow meters, and metering systems in China. It offers water meters for residential water supply, water supply management, modeling, and billing applications; and heat meters for residential, public buildings, temperature control, and billing applications. The company was formerly known as Tangshan Huizhong Instrumentation Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Huizhong Instrumentation Co., Ltd. in September 2015. Huizhong Instrumentation Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Tangshan, China.

300373.SZ.long_name: Yangzhou Yangjie Electronic Technology Co., Ltd.
300373.SZ.summary: Yangzhou Yangjie Electronic Technology Co., Ltd. designs and produces semiconductor products worldwide. It offers semiconductor chips, diodes, bridge rectifiers, and power modules used in lighting, power supply, customer electronics, computer and peripheral equipment, electronic instruments and meters, communication, industrial and automatic control, automotive electronics, and other fields. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Yangzhou, China.

300377.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Ysstech Info-Tech Co.,Ltd provides system solutions for the financial industry in the China. The company offers investment trading products, including investment trading management platforms; and risk management and performance products comprising combination management, investment decision analysis, investment risk management integration, financial asset risk management and performance evaluation, investment performance attribution analysis system, financial model management system, and financial data warehouse system solutions. It also provides liquidation, accounting, and valuation products, such as assets financial valuation system, asset management system, assets integrated information management system, clearing system, XBRL information disclosure system, and interbank data interface system solutions. In addition, the company offers bank and financial asset custody products, including financial asset management system, custodian bank clearing system, and bank monitoring system solutions, as well as hosting service platform. It serves banks, fund companies, securities companies, insurance companies, trust companies, financial management companies, national social security, and others. Shenzhen Ysstech Info-Tech Co.,Ltd is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300378.SZ.summary: Digiwin Software Co.,Ltd. provides industry-specific software solutions in the Greater China and South East Asia. It offers ERP/ERPII solutions, including T-series products for large size companies; E-series products for medium size companies; C-series products for small companies; and A-series cloud services for small to micro businesses. The company serves manufacturing, distribution and retail, and micro and small enterprises. Digiwin Software Co.,Ltd. is based in Shanghai, China.

300379.SZ.summary: Beijing Tongtech Co., Ltd. provides security solutions in China. It offers communications security, 5G innovation applications, and industrial Internet security products and solutions to help users achieve business innovation, security management, and data sharing and value mining. The company provides middleware products and solutions; and information security, network security, data security, business security, and other products; and support services. Its products and solutions are used in various industries, such as telecommunications, finance, government, energy, transportation and other industries. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

300380.SZ.summary: Shanghai Amarsoft Information & Technology Co.,Ltd provides IT solutions to financial and non-financial customers in China. It offers software products, such as credit management, risk management, trust management, P2P online loan, and supply chain financing systems, as well as business consulting, system development and implementation, data services, and other services. In addition, the company provides cloud platform. Shanghai Amarsoft Information & Technology Co.,Ltd is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

300383.SZ.summary: Beijing Sinnet Technology Co., Ltd provides Internet data center (IDC), Internet access (ISP), and cloud computing services worldwide. The company offers IDC services, including network security, server hosting and VIP room rental services; load balancing, disaster recovery, reverse DNS, VPN, and traffic monitoring; air conditioning firewall protection, DDOS protection, and intrusion detection service; and customized operation and maintenance services. It also provides public cloud, private cloud, hybrid cloud, cloud management platform, and cloud infrastructure platforms; and ISP services, such as optical fiber access, PCM access, EDSL access, microwave access, and point to point leased services to customers. In addition, the company offers network system integration services that include Internet integration for small and medium enterprises, ERP solutions for large enterprises, and network services for telecom industry. Beijing Sinnet Technology Co., Ltd was founded in 1999 and is based in Beijing, China.

300386.SZ.summary: Feitian Technologies Co., Ltd. provides authentication and transaction security solutions for secure online banking and transaction security worldwide. It offers OTP display, chip embedded, and fingerprint cards; FIDO2 security key to encrypt, store, and protect fingerprint data; FIDO U2F, a security key for supporting USB, NFC, and BLE communications; mobile payment terminals; PKI identification products; OTP authentication products; smart card readers; smart card OS, a java card operating system; software protection products; cloud based service platform; and BlockChain, a cryptocurrency wallet. The company also provides turnkey solution, which includes secure hardware, operating systems, middleware, software application, and services, such as personalization and remote lifecycle management. The company's customers include financial institutions, as well as telecom, government, and business enterprises. Feitian Technologies Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

300389.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Absen Optoelectronic Co.,Ltd. provides integrated services and turnkey solutions in the LED display industry in China. It offers indoor and outdoor fixed LED displays, outdoor and indoor rental LED displays, and UHD LED displays. The company's products are used in outdoor advertising billboards, business centers, shopping malls, sport stadiums, indoor and outdoor stages, exhibitions, TV stations, traffic signs, and others. It also exports its products to approximately 120 countries and regions. Shenzhen Absen Optoelectronic Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.

300393.SZ.summary: Jolywood (Suzhou) Sunwatt Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells integrated photovoltaic (PV) products worldwide. It offers solar module backsheets, P-type and N-type mono-crystalline silicon solar cells, and N-type bifacial solar cells; and invests in, installs, and operates distributed PV systems. The company was formerly known as Jolywood (Suzhou) Solar Material Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Jolywood (Suzhou) Sunwatt Co., Ltd. in 2011. Jolywood (Suzhou) Sunwatt Co., Ltd. was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Changzhou, China.

300399.SZ.long_name: Beijing Tianli Mobile Service Integration, Inc.
300399.SZ.summary: Beijing Tianli Mobile Service Integration, Inc. provides integrated solutions for mobile information systems in China. The company offers mobile information application solutions, including customized development, business integration, operational support, and customer relationship management services, as well as SMS, MMS application, and cloud platform-based mobile information services to large and medium-sized group customers. It also provides Internet finance and insurance services; and software custom development, terminal equipment, operation support, and comprehensive consulting services. Beijing Tianli Mobile Service Integration, Inc. was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

300403.SZ.summary: Hanyu Group Joint-Stock Co., Ltd. manufactures and supplies washing machine and dishwasher core components, and drainage pumps for household appliances in China. It offers spa toilet, permanent magnet ferrite radial anisotropy rotor, and special engineering plastic products, as well as automotive core components and micro-charged products. The company was formerly known as Jiangmen iDear-Hanyu Electrical Joint-Stock Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Hanyu Group Joint-Stock Co., Ltd. in December 2019. Hanyu Group Joint-Stock Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Jiangmen, China.

300408.SZ.summary: Chaozhou Three-Circle (Group) Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of electronic basic materials, electronic components, and communication devices in China and internationally. The company offers ceramic exterior parts for mobiles, ceramic covers for fingerprint modules, and ceramic parts for smart wearable devices; piezo micro dispensing systems; ceramic components for fiber optic communication products; ceramic metallizations; anode supported solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) cells and SOFC electrolyte membranes; fixed resistors and multilayer ceramic chip capacitors; ceramic substrates; ceramic capillary products, fashion ceramics, ceramic knife sets, mechanical ceramics, and ceramic bearings; and lithium battery cover assembly products and hermetic terminals for compressors. Its products are used in optical communications, electronics, electrical, machinery, energy conservation and environmental protection, new energy, biological, and fashion applications. The company was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Chaozhou, China.

300410.SZ.summary: Guangdong Zhengye Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, sale, and after-sale servicing of precision inspection equipment and electronic materials in China. The company develops and produces X-ray machines, UV laser cutting machines, automatic reinforcement machines, UV laser drilling machines, PCB cutting machines, hole checkers, TDR impedance testers, ionic contamination testers, thermal resistance testers, and other precision equipment for use in PCBs and lithium batteries. It also offers lab testing machines, laser marking machines, and PCB manufacturing machines. In addition, the company provides consumable materials, such as filtration purification, precision photosensitive, dedicated plastics, and precision positioning products, as well as other electronic materials for use in PCB, SMT, lithium battery, environmental protection, and food industries. Guangdong Zhengye Technology Co., Ltd. also exports its products to Russia, the United States, England, Japan, Korea, Brazil, Singapore, Thailand, Malaysia, Vietnam, etc. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Dongguan, China.

300416.SZ.summary: Suzhou Sushi Testing Group Co., Ltd. provides mechanics environmental test equipment and solutions. The company's products include electro-dynamic shakers, electro-dynamic test systems, electro-dynamic vibration test systems, multi-point test systems, life test and accelerated stress screens, multi-loading composite systems, hydraulic vibration systems, shock testers, drop test systems, vibration test systems and sensors, digital vibration controllers, auxiliary devices, slip and other tables, and automobile simulation transport and transportation vibration testers. Its products are used to simulate the vibration, shock, collision, and falling environmental conditions to assess the reliability of the quality of industrial products. The company was formerly known as Suzhou Sushi Testing Instrument Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Suzhou Sushi Testing Group Co., Ltd. in August 2017. Suzhou Sushi Testing Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1956 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.

300417.SZ.summary: Nanhua Instruments Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells vehicle test equipment in China. The company offers vehicle inspection line products, such as suspension, wheel steering angle, plate brake, speed meter, wheel load, side slip, break, multi-axle wheel load, vehicle dimension, and loaded brake testers, as well as free roller and play detector. It also offers exhaust gas analyzers, BASM detection products, VMAS/ASM/lugdown testing systems, and headlight testers. In addition, the company provides motor vehicle emission detection instruments, environmental protection detection systems, and safety detection instruments, as well as safety detection systems, including computer detection/management network control system software. It also exports its products to Asia, the United States, Europe, and other countries. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Foshan, China.

300433.SZ.summary: Lens Technology Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells window touch protective glass panels, touch modules, and window touch protection new materials. It offers window protection glass, touch screen monomer, touch screen module, camera module, fingerprint module, and camera related products, as well as buttons, ceramics, metal parts, and other products. The company's products are used in mobile phones, tablet PCs, notebook computers, digital cameras, players, GPS navigators, automotive instrumentation, smart homes, medical equipment, and other areas. Lens Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Changsha, China.

300447.SZ.long_name: Nanjing Quanxin Cable Technology Co., Ltd.
300447.SZ.summary: Nanjing Quanxin Cable Technology Co., Ltd. develops and produces military optoelectronic transmission products. Its products are used in the aviation, aerospace, ships, weapons, and electronics fields. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Nanjing, China.

The company specializes in the provision of cloud computing, and network security and optimization solutions. It offers network security products, including Internet access management products; NGAF firewall platform; and SSL VPN products that provide support for remote user to access the enterprise network. The company also offers SD-WAN optimization solutions, including hardware and virtual software products for the Internet, internal WANs, public and private clouds, and hybrid networks. In addition, it provides virtual desktop infrastructure products; EasyConnect, a remote access solution, which allows the access to Windows desktops and applications; application delivery solutions for service systems; hyper-converged infrastructure solutions; and aBOS, a NFV converged gateway solution. The company serves finance and banking industry, governments, Internet service providers, schools and universities, and enterprises. Sangfor Technologies Inc. was founded in 2000 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

300455.SZ.summary: Beijing Ctrowell Technology Corporation Limited engages in the research and production of railway vehicle safety detection technology products. The company offers vehicle infrared axis temperature detection systems and truck running fault dynamic image detection systems, as well as AS/RS warehouse, railway MIS, and other products. Beijing Ctrowell Technology Corporation Limited was founded in 1988 and is based in Beijing, China.

300456.SZ.summary: Navtech Inc. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of inertial, satellite, and integrated navigation products in China. The company also offers unmanned systems, MEMS series products, avionics, and intelligent manufacturing products. It serves the aviation and navigation, surveying and mapping, unmanned system, consumer electronic, intelligent control, weapon, scientific research and teaching, and other fields. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Beijing, China.

300458.SZ.summary: Allwinnertech Technology Co.,Ltd., a fabless design company, provides smart application processor SoCs and analog ICs worldwide. The company offers its products for the connected automotive application, smart hardware, smart home device, service robot, drone, virtual reality, tablet, Internet TV, automotive in-dash device, smart power management, and mobile connected device markets. 300460.SZ.summary: Guangdong Failong Crystal Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and marketing of frequency control and selection components in China. Its products include SMD glass, SMD seam sealing, DIP crystal resonators, and TCXO, as well as quartz crystal oscillators for use in electronics industries, such as computer network peripherals, wireless communication, mobile phone, vehicle, GPS, digital audiovisuals, and remote control devices, as well as medical equipment, laptops, TVs, PCs, smart meters, automotive electronics, and aerospace applications. The company also sells its products in Europe, the United States, Japan, Korea, Hong Kong, and Taiwan. 300465.SZ.summary: Global Infotech Co., Ltd. provides financial information software products and integrated services in China. In addition, the company offers EasyCard bank card, EasyTERM bank front end, and Easy CMGIS bank channel management information systems; and CAP ESB gao weida enterprise, EasyBPM workflow, and EasyHMFS maintenance fund integrated management systems, as well as EasyWEB page generation and EasyReport reporting platform solutions, and software testing services. Further, it provides data center consulting and planning, integration and implementation, and operation and maintenance services; cloud computing data center IT service management products and solutions; planning consultation, business consulting, and technical consultation services; and system integration, operation and maintenance, and implementation services. 300466.SZ.summary: Saimo Technology Co., Ltd. provides intelligent detection products and control systems in China. Its Packaging division provides flexible and bulk packaging lines; weighing and filling products, such as multihead and linear weighers, auger fillers, and volumetric cup fillers; open mouth, valve bag, bulk bag, and premade bag packers, as well as vertical form fill seals, bulk bag dischargers, and vacuum loaders; checkweigher and metal detector inspection products; robotic, low level, and high level palletizers; and inclined, screw, take off, bet, and chain conveyors, as well as turn tables and bucket elevators. The company also provides spare parts and manuals, and field and training services; and industrial handling robots and quantitative packaging machinery. In addition, it offers pillow bag, tray, carton, bottle, open mouth bag, and bulk bag solutions for the dry and processed food, fresh food, frozen food, liquid and thick, and nonfood industries; and bulk handling solutions for the power, chemical, cement, steel, metallurgy, port, coal, and quarry industries. The company was formerly known as Saimo Electric Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Saimo Technology Co., Ltd. in May 2020. Saimo Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Xuzhou, China.

300468.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen Forms Syntron Information Co., Ltd.

The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300474.SZ.summary: Changsha Jingjia Microelectronics Co., Ltd. engages in designing, manufacturing, and selling electronic products. 300493.SZ.summary: Shanghai Fortune Techgroup Co., Ltd. provides semiconductor products and solutions in China. Its products include wired and wireless communications, radio frequency and power amplifier type of components, sensors and others, as well as module for NBIoT (5G) usage. 300504.SZ.long_name: Sichuan Tianyi Comheart Telecom Co., Ltd.
300504.SZ.summary: Sichuan Tianyi Comheart Telecom Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, sells, and services optical and mobile communication products in China. 300514.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen Friendcom Technology Development Co., Ltd.

The company offers low voltage power collection terminal products, including micro power wireless, power line carrier, and CFDA auxiliary equipment; intelligent power distribution products; water and gas heat meter low power modules; wireless digital radios; RF modules; water meters; gas meters; energy meters; automatic meter reading equipment; electric meters; wireless M-Bus modules; cellular network modules; LoRa products, which includes WAN modules and terminals; and sewage treatment. 300515.SZ.long_name: Hunan Sundy Science and Technology Co., Ltd.
300515.SZ.summary: Hunan Sundy Science and Technology Co., Ltd. supplies coal analysis solutions in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company offers bomb calorimeters; elemental analyzers, including carbon hydrogen and nitrogen, infrared sulfur, coulomb sulfur, and fluorine and chlorine analyzers; and thermogravimetric analyzers comprising loss on ignition analyzers, moisture analyzers, and intelligent muffle furnaces. It also provides ash fusion testers; hardgrove grindability index testers; sample preparation equipment, such as quick dryer, hammer crusher and divider, jaw crusher, double roll crusher, humid coal hammer crusher and divider, pulverizer, automatic divider, standard sieve shaker, environmental sieve, and crushing dividing combined products; and auto sampling systems comprising fuel management and control, integrated sampling and sample preparation system, and coal yard dynamic management and control systems. In addition, the company offers preceding stage sample preparation, online total moisture test, automatic sample storing and checking cabinet, dust extraction, and coal quality management systems, as well as stationery laser and unmanned aerial vehicle stockpile inventorying equipment. Its products are used in coal and coke, biomass fuel, food and feed, and environmental applications. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Changsha, the People's Republic of China.

300516.SZ.long_name: Hubei Jiuzhiyang Infrared System Co., Ltd

300561.SZ.summary: SGSG Science&Technology Co., Ltd. It also develops bank self-service device cash replenishment and distribution management systems, bank physical/electronic seal management systems, intelligent bank outlet solutions, bank cash flow physical internal control systems, bank treasury management solutions, and other products, as well as supplies internal control risk management solutions for the financial industry. Its products and solutions are used in FTTX, 3G/4G, and transmission networks. The company serves telecom operators, ICT equipment manufacturers, and network integrators. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Xiamen, China.

300659.SZ.summary: Zhongfu Information Inc. provides information security software and hardware products. The company offers protection products, including host protection products that consists of computer and mobile storage media security management systems, host monitoring and auditing systems, print security monitoring and auditing systems, CD burning monitoring and auditing systems, terminal security login systems, storage media information elimination and removal tools, USB mobile storage media usage management systems, keyboard and mouse display switchers, and mobile hard and U disks, as well as cyber security products comprising network security isolation and information one-way import systems, and network access control systems. It also provides inspection products, such as inspection and evidence collection systems, database and terminal security check systems, and email check systems; and password applications and security solutions. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Jinan, China.

300663.SZ.summary: Client Service International, Inc. develops and sells financial software products for high-tech companies in China. The company offers various software solutions for the banking industry; and consulting services. Its products and services include direct Internet banking; financial open platform; e-banking solutions; and online banking security solutions, as well as business series solutions. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Beijing, China.

300666.SZ.summary: Konfoong Materials International Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells metal materials and sputtering targets for the semiconductor and integrated circuit industries in Europe, the United States, Japan, South Korea, Southeast Asia, Taiwan, and Mainland China. The company offers semiconductor targets; metal sputtering targets and backing plates for the solar industry; and metal sputtering target and spare parts for the liquid crystal displays, and shield plates for PVD and liquid crystal glass handing parts for carbon fiber reinforced plastics. It also provides precision parts for semiconductors; clamp rings and collimators for PVD tools; face plates and shower heads for CVD and etching tools; and diamond disks and retainer rings for CMP tools. In addition, the company offers materials for applications in sputtering targets, anodes, solar products, audio devices, vacuum electron devices and cables, etc., as well as technical support services. Konfoong Materials International Co., Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is based in Yuyao, China.

300671.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen Fine Made Electronics Group Co., Ltd.
300671.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Fine Made Electronics Group Co., Ltd. engages in the design, development, packaging, testing, and sale of analog and digital-analog hybrid integrated circuits in China. Its products are used in power management class, LED lights, LED control and drivers, MCU class, audio amplifiers, MOSFET class, infrared remote control, and others. Shenzhen Fine Made Electronics Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

300672.SZ.summary: Hunan Goke Microelectronics Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development of integrated circuits in China. It offers its products for use in smart set-top boxes, intelligent surveillance, Internet of Things, and storage systems. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Changsha, China.

300674.SZ.summary: Yusys Technologies Co., Ltd. provides IT solutions to banking-based financial institutions in China. It offers consulting, software products, user experience design, software development and implementation, operation and maintenance, test, and system integration services. The company provides business products for core banking system, financial intermediations, and credit operation systems; channel products for channel management systems, counter systems, mobile banking, direct banking, telephone bank/call center, and self-service banking; and management products for back-office management solutions, business intelligence, and customer relationship management. Yusys Technologies Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 is headquartered in Beijing, China.

300678.SZ.long_name: Chengdu Information Technology of The Chinese Academy of Sciences Co., Ltd.
300678.SZ.summary: Chengdu Information Technology of The Chinese Academy of Sciences Co., Ltd. provides intelligent engineering, and related products and technical services to government, tobacco, oil and gas, special printing, and other industries. It offers election equipment and service for party and national conferences; testing equipment for the national printing industry; and intelligent city key technology, platform system, and transportation solutions based on cloud computing, large data, Internet of Things, and mobile Internet for government. The company also provides various solutions for tobacco industry comprising tobacco planting expert analysis system; tobacco leaf digital storage and logistics integrated platform; data collection and intelligent diagnosis and analysis system in cigarette factory; life cycle tracking and management system for cigarette accessories; cigarette research and development information management system; and tobacco logistics park information infrastructure construction solutions. In addition, it offers inspection equipment for banknote printing industry, such as large bill quality inspection machines, banknote printed gravure online detection systems, paper machine online quality inspection systems, cutting quality on line detection systems, and banknote sorting machines; and oil and gas industry information construction solutions, including oil and gas field digital production management solution, as well as integrates electronic logging, automatic collection, real-time monitoring, intelligent defense, management, and scientific command solutions. Chengdu Information Technology of The Chinese Academy of Sciences Co., Ltd. was founded in 1958 and is based in Chengdu, China.

300682.SZ.summary: Longshine Technology Group Co., Ltd. provides software and IT services for the power industry in China and internationally. It provides inspection monitoring system of power marketing; billing and customer service system; call center operation management system; LongShine Zeus cloud platform; data visualization platform; data processing platform; IoT acquisition platform; smart city industry Internet open platform; and order merchandise and living payment platforms. It also provides China international trade single window platform, port operation-service and public service platforms, identification service for international trade; new energy vehicle, integrated energy service cloud, EV pile cloud, smart power cloud, government new energy, intelligent parking, smart street light, charging pile management, photovoltaic cloud, and IoT terminal solutions; HanClouds industrial Internet platform; intelligent customer service, self-help intelligence analysis, and relationship network analysis solutions. In addition, the company offers cloud services, such as consulting, planning, and cloud design and implementation services, as well as traditional data center hybrid cloud upgrade and construction services; and intelligent cloud based customer services. The company was formerly known as LongShine Technology Co., Ltd. Longshine Technology Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Wuxi, China.

300691.SZ.summary: Union Optech Co.,Ltd. engages in optical lens design and development, and precision manufacturing and sales in China. Its products are used in security video surveillance cameras, mobile phones, automotive imaging systems, video conferencing, digital cameras/camcorders, smart home, sports DV, aerial drone, VR VR, and laser projection products. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Zhongshan, China.

300698.SZ.summary: Wanma Technology Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells communication electronics and communication connection equipment. Its telecom division products include optical fiber products, outdoor telecom cabinets, copper products, broadband access integrated distribution boxes, equipment cabinets, and transmission equipment use power distribution file cabinets. The company's medical division offers medical devices. Its principal products are used in various areas, such as IDC building, cloud platform, communication network, medical field, national high-speed railway, and railway transportation construction. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Linan, China.

300701.SZ.summary: Senba Sensing Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of photoelectric components in China. The company offers digital and analog PIR sensors, LDR photoresistors, analog optoisolators, linear light sensor, Fresnel lens, PIR sensor modules, and infrared bandpass fliters. Its components are used in toys, lighting, switches, household appliances, medical, industry, security, military, and other fields. The company was formerly known as Nan Yang Senba Optical and Electronic Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Senba Sensing Technology Co., Ltd. in April 2018. Senba Sensing Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

300710.SZ.long_name: Hangzhou Prevail Optoelectronic Equipment Co., Ltd.
300710.SZ.summary: Hangzhou Prevail Optoelectronic Equipment Co., Ltd. researches, develops, and produces CATV equipment. It offers HFC optical fiber transmission products, such as switches, as well as optical receivers, amplifiers, transmitters, platforms, and optical nodes. The company also provides CATV coaxial cable transmission products comprising bidirectional building and outdoor bi-directional amplifiers, power supplies, and taps and splitters; and digital TV equipment consisting of DVB/IP stream processing devices, encoders, DVB sourcers and adapters, IPTV stream platforms, and other equipment. In addition, it offers EPON and GPON optical network equipment; PTN transmission equipment; industrial Ethernet switches; Ethernet testers; and network management software. The company sells its products in China, Europe, North America, and internationally. Hangzhou Prevail Optoelectronic Equipment Co., Ltd. is based in Hangzhou, China.

300711.SZ.summary: GHT Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, sale, and servicing of ICT-related products in China and internationally. The company offers H20-20 program-controlled exchange, IP switching, railway digital dispatching communication, converged video, network management, and audio recording systems. It offers its solutions to the defense, electric power, railway, and industrial sectors. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Guangzhou, China.

300726.SZ.summary: Zhuzhou Hongda Electronics Corp.,Ltd. researches and develops, manufactures, sells, and services tantalum capacitors and other military electronic components in China. The company offers multilayer and single layer ceramic capacitors, film capacitors, polymer chip aluminum capacitors, and super capacitors; inductors, magnetic beads, transformers, resistors, microwave device components, circulators, and isolators; power modules; I/F converters; power management chips; ltcc filters, embedded computer boards, and ceramic thin film circuits; and other products. Its products are used in cover systems engineering and equipment, such as vehicles, aircraft, ships, radars, and electronic products. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Zhuzhou, China.

300730.SZ.long_name: Hunan Creator Information Technologies CO., LTD.
300730.SZ.summary: Hunan Creator Information Technologies CO., LTD. provides information services for government and enterprise customers in China. The company also provides cloud/data center infrastructure integration, network and security integration, unified communications integration, database/middleware integration, and system tuning services; and IT infrastructure, weak current engineering, and desktop operation and maintenance services. In addition, it offers consulting services for smart city construction, industry applications, and informatization projects, as well as private cloud planning consulting services. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Changsha, China.

300738.SZ.long_name: Guangdong Aofei Data Technology Co., Ltd.
300738.SZ.summary: Guangdong Aofei Data Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the data center and communication integrated operation businesses in China. It offers server hosting and rental, professional cloud computing and big data application, and BGP interconnection services. The company is based in Guangzhou, China.

300739.SZ.summary: Sunshine Global Circuits Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells printed circuit boards (PCBs) in China. Its products are used in various applications, such as industrial control, medical electronics, automotive electronics, telecommunication equipment, LED lighting, and other applications. The company also exports its products to Europe, North America, and Asia. Sunshine Global Circuits Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300747.SZ.long_name: Wuhan Raycus Fiber Laser Technologies Co.,Ltd.
300747.SZ.summary: Wuhan Raycus Fiber Laser Technologies Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells high power fiber lasers and devices in the People's Republic of China. The company offers single module CW fiber, short-pulse fiber, fiber delivered direct diode laser, quasi-continuous fiber, 10-100W Q-switched pulse fiber, and high-power multimode continuous fiber lasers. It also exports its products to Asia, Europe, the United States, the Middle East, and internationally. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Wuhan, the People's Republic of China.

300751.SZ.summary: Suzhou Maxwell Technologies Co., Ltd. develops, produces, and sells production equipment for the solar cell and OLED panel industries. It also offers solar screen printing equipment. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Suzhou, China.

300752.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Longli Technology Co.,Ltd engages in the research and development, production, and sale of LED backlight display modules in China. Its products are used in communication, computer, industrial control, vehicle, medical display, and other fields. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

300762.SZ.summary: Jushri Technologies Inc. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of military broadband mobile communication systems and tactical communication equipment. The company is also involved in the provision of communication technologies, and integrated information solutions for railway and urban rail transit. In addition, it offers electronic welfare system. The company's products are used in various military applications, including base station, relay, terminal, module, and system software. It has 33 patents and 67 software copyrights. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Shanghai, China.

300768.SZ.summary: Hangzhou DPtech Technologies Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells network security and application delivery products and solutions in China. The company offers application firewall, intrusion prevention system, bandwidth management, deep packet inspection, Web application firewall, anti-DDoS, application network, industrial Ethernet, unified threat management, and WLAN products, as well as technical solutions. It serves customers in various industries, such as service providers, governments, power grid, finance, education, etc. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

300773.SZ.summary: Lakala Payment Corporation provides third-party payment and financial technology services in China. The company offers third-party payment, personal payment, merchant receipt, and related derivative services in the form of online/offline and hardware/software. It provides convenient payment, POS receipt, and cross-border payment services; and Internet finance and community e-commerce services to community residents. The company also offers receipt and convenient terminal, and payment bracelet products. It provides value-added services for various industries, such as catering, retail, insurance, education, tourism, etc. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Beijing, China.

300782.SZ.summary: Maxscend Microelectronics Company Limited develops and markets communication RF components and Internet of Things (IoT) ICs. Its products are used in IoT and RF component applications. The company was incorporated in 2012 and is headquartered in Wuxi, the People's Republic of China.

300787.SZ.summary: Anfu CE LINK Limited manufacturers and sells custom-made Cables and accessories for AV, PC, and mobile applications in Mainland China. The company offers a range of cables and adapters, and smart wireless accessories, as well as power related products, including USB power stations power banks travel and car chargers, wireless charging products, and inverters. It also provides AV distribution products, such as HDMI matrix, switcher, splitter, converter, and extender products; HDBaseT and AV/USB extenders; and AV matrix, switcher, splitter/hub, and converter products. The company is based in Ji'an, China.

300790.SZ.summary: DongGuan YuTong Optical Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, sale, and after-sales service of optical lenses and parts, CCTV lenses, and related products in China. It offers zoom, 4K, starlight, fish-eye, MTV, vari-focal, and motorized zoom lens products used in the CCTV surveillance, industry, vehicle, consumer products, and other fields. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Dongguan, China.

300799.SZ.summary: Beijing Zuojiang Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the design, research and development, production, and sale of hardware platform and boards related for network information safety applications. It operates through Products Sales; and Subcontracted Research and Development segments. The company's products include secure heterogeneous dual host platforms and secure homogenous dual host platforms. It serves the military sector. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Beijing, China.

300802.SZ.summary: Jutze Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, and manufacturing of automatic optical inspection equipment and laser marker stations in China and internationally. The company also provides system integration services, including electro-mechanical assembly, box build, and sub-systems assembly through full system integration; and sheet metal fabrication services, as well as manufactures custom cable assemblies, wire harnesses, and custom specialty assemblies for communication, industrial, healthcare and medical, and automotive and financial markets. Jutze Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2007 and is based in Shanghai, China.

300807.SZ.summary: Zhengzhou Tiamaes Technology Co., Ltd engages in the research, development, design, production, and sale of vehicle electronic products for urban public transport smart solutions. Its products include fare box and cashier counting machines; on-board computers, driving recorders, intelligent passenger counters, LED screens, and section station apparatus products; electronic bus-stop boards and guiding screens; and scheduling screens, dispatching terminals, and bus dispatching communication machines. The company also offers software products, such as enterprise resource management comprehensive information management system, urban public traffic intelligent application platform, bus comprehensive operation detecting monitoring platform, bus cashier system, bus intelligent dispatching system, travel services mobile client, bus operation monitoring platform, bus oiling management system, intelligent fare collection management cloud platform, passenger flow scheduling analysis system, and energy charging monitoring system solutions. It serves bus companies and cities. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Zhengzhou, China.

300810.SZ.long_name: Beijing Zhongkehaixun Digital S&T Co., Ltd.
300810.SZ.summary: Beijing Zhongkehaixun Digital S&T Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of related products in the sonar field. The company is based in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

300824.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Crastal Technology Co.,Ltd. provides small kitchen appliances, and ancillary products and services. It sells its products in Europe, the United States, Australia, the Middle East, and other countries and regions. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

300827.SZ.summary: Sineng Electric Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and marketing of power and electronic products. Its products include PV solutions, including utility PV, hilly terrain PV, water front PV, commercial PV, and residential PV solutions; power filters comprising active power filters, static Var generators, and smart power quality correction productions; and DC and AC energy storage products. The company offers solutions in power and related industries comprising power generation, power supply, and power distribution system. Sineng Electric Co.,Ltd. is based in Wuxi, China.

300830.SZ.summary: JinXianDai Information Industry Co.,Ltd. develops software products in China.
