300831.SZ.long_name: Xi'an Peri Power Semiconductor Converting Technology Co.,Ltd.
300831.SZ.summary: Xi'an Peri Power Semiconductor Converting Technology Co.,Ltd. designs, develops, produces, and services power semiconductor discrete devices, power electronic converters, and power semiconductor device test and other equipment. The company offers power semiconductor devices, such as high-power thyristors and rectifiers, power semiconductor modules, IGBT modules, and heat sinks; and power electronics, including aluminum electrolytic rectifier cabinet, high-power IGBT switching power supply, and DC test station power supply products. It also provides test and non-standard equipment comprising power semiconductor device discrete, comprehensive, conventional, and custom test equipment. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Xi'an, China. Xi'an Peri Power Semiconductor Converting Technology Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of Xi'an Power Electronics Technology Research Institute.

300846.SZ.summary: Capitalonline Data Service Co., Ltd. provides cloud computing services. It also offers IDC hosting and IT value-added, IT outsourcing, communication integration, and other information services for e-commerce, gaming, finance, big data, medical, PaaS/SaaS, and various other industries. The company operates in Beijing and Wuxi, China; Hong Kong; Taipei, Taiwan; Dallas, Los Angeles, and New York, the United States; Tokyo, Japan; Singapore; Frankfurt, Germany; Amsterdam, the Netherlands, and internationally. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

300852.SZ.long_name: Sihui Fuji Electronics Technology Co., Ltd.
300852.SZ.summary: Sihui Fuji Electronics Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures printed circuit boards for FA, medical, power, communication, and automobile sectors worldwide. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Zhaoqing City, China.

300857.SZ.summary: Sharetronic Data Technology Co., Ltd. operates as a solution provider in wireless network and smart terminal worldwide. The company production lines primarily focuses on Internet of things, smart home, and car networking. It offers virtual reality products, such as VR headsets; laptops; WiFi IP cameras; and NAs storage products. Sharetronic Data Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

300862.SZ.summary: Anhui Landun Photoelectron Co., Ltd. researches and produces analytical measuring instruments. The company offers transportation products, such as speed measuring products, cameras, fill light products, intelligent management systems, information release products, signal light and machine products, and traffic weather collection products; traffic front-end subsystems; and software platform. It also provides application solutions, and operation and maintenance services in the fields of intelligent transportation, smart environmental protection, intelligent weather, and food and drug safety. The company is headquartered in Tongling, China.

300866.SZ.summary: Anker Innovations Limited develops and sells smart charging products worldwide. It offers portable batteries, and wired and wireless charging products for the home, car, and on-the-go, as well as charging products for phones, tablets, and laptops under the Anker brand name; speakers and earphones under the Soundcore brand name; Alexa-powered home speakers, lights, vacuums, and smart plugs under the EUFY brand name; portable projectors under the NEBULA brand name; and dashcam cameras, smart car chargers, and Alexa car kits under the ROAV brand name. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Changsha, China.

300872.SZ.summary: Tansun Technology Co., Ltd. provides long-term information technology (IT) solutions and services for financial industry customers in China and internationally. It offers supply chain finance consulting services, transaction banking solutions, integrated risk management systems, retail bank IT architecture consulting services, retail credit product delivery systems, business consulting and joint operating platforms, performance management consulting solutions, business intelligence and big data applications, micro service container cloud platforms, and workflow engines. The company also provides TREE, a financial business application; professional IT planning consultation and project implementation services; and wind control models for retail credit business, such as credit granting, lending, and post-lending. In addition, it offers risk control, open banking, and data governance solutions, as well as industrial financial platforms; automated testing, non-functional testing, big data platform testing, data migration validation, and demand labeling solutions, as well as testing consultation services. It serves central banks, political banks, state-owned banks, joint-stock banks, local commercial banks, and non-banking financial institutions. Tansun Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Lhasa, China.

300880.SZ.summary: Ningbo Jianan Electronics Co.,Ltd engages in the research, development, production, and sale of smart meters, electricity information collection terminals, and energy metering boxes. Its products include single- and three-phase smart meters, intelligent power management terminals, electric energy metering boxes, distribution network automation equipment, charging piles, etc. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Cixi, China.

300882.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Wellsun Intelligent Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, production, and sale of electric energy measuring instrument and power automation systems. It offers sets of single-phase intelligent ammeters, three-phase intelligent ammeters, concentrators, collectors, terminals, and electric energy measuring boxes. The company also provides Internet of Things equipment, and distribution network automation and main station management systems. It serves customers in South Asia, Africa, the Middle East, Europe, and internationally. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Tiantai, China.

300895.SZ.long_name: Beijing Topnew Info & Tech Co., Ltd.
300895.SZ.summary: Beijing Topnew Info & Tech Co., Ltd. provides Internet data center services, Internet access services, and related value-added services. Its cloud services include Internet access, cloud computing, and cloud video conference services; IT services comprise configuration center and speed WAN services; and network Shield security management systems. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

300897.SZ.summary: Hangzhou Seck Intelligent Technology Co.,Ltd. primarily manufactures and processes meter reading system products and rotor wet long-distance cold water meters. The company engages in the electronic computer and system integration, and technology development, as well as technical development of smart water meter systems and software, and water automation and information systems. It is also involved in the installation of intelligent water meters and meter reading systems; wholesale and retail of electronic products, instruments, and water supply equipment; and import and export of goods. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

300903.SZ.summary: Guangdong Kingshine Electronic Technology Co.,Ltd. researches and develops, produces, and sells printed circuit boards in China. Its products are primarily used in mobile terminal equipment, automotive electronics, network communication equipment, household appliances, office equipment, new energy equipment, industrial security, medical electronics, artificial intelligence, and other fields. The company also exports its products to the United States, Canada, Australia, Brazil, Poland, Italy, Spain, Africa, India, Singapore, Malaysia, South Korea, Japan, and other countries and regions. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Huizhou, China.

300906.SZ.long_name: Jiangxi Everbright Measurement Control Technology Co.,Ltd
300906.SZ.summary: Jiangxi Everbright Measurement Control Technology Co.,Ltd manufactures track inspection instrument, track measuring instrument, track testing equipment combination, and other testing equipment. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Nanchang, China. Jiangxi Everbright Measurement Control Technology Co.,Ltd operates as a subsidiary of Jiangxi Riyueming Industrial Co., Ltd.

300925.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Farben Information Technology Co.,Ltd. provides software technology services and solutions worldwide. It offers solutions in the areas of personalized systems, data warehouse upgrade, data management analysis, E-commerce website, data management platform management, and big data platform building. The company also offers IT, consulting, cloud, and product development services. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300935.SZ.summary: Beijing YJK Building Software Co.,Ltd. develops and sells building structure design software and consulting services for the construction industry in China and internationally. It offers an integrated building structure auxiliary design system that comprises YJK-A, a building structure calculation module; YJK-F, a basic design module; YJK-M, a masonry structure design module; YJK-D, a structure construction drawing design module; YJK-STS, a steel structure construction drawing design module; YJK-EP, an elastoplastic dynamic time history analysis module; and an interface module. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Beijing, China.

300940.SZ.long_name: Shen Zhen Australis Electronic Technology Co.,Ltd.
300940.SZ.summary: Antarctic Shenzhen Optoelectronic Technology Co., Ltd. engaged in the research, development, production, and sale of mobile phone components with backlight display modules. Its products are used in various display fields, such as smart phones and car monitors, medical displays, industrial control equipment displays, home appliance displays, and other consumer electronics displays. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

3396.HK.summary: Legend Holdings Corporation, an diversified investment holding company, together with its subsidiaries, operates in information technology (IT), financial services, innovative consumption and services, agriculture and food, advanced manufacturing and professional services, and financial investments businesses in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company's IT segment develops, manufactures, and markets technology products and services to customers and enterprises. Its Financial Services segment offers banking, short-term financing, financial leasing, insurance brokerage, third party payment, internet finance, property insurance, and other related business services. The company's Innovative Consumption and Services segment provides medical and health services, car rental business, and education services for kids. Its Agriculture and Food segment plants and sells fruit and tea products; produces and sells salmon and Chinese liquor; supplies seafood and accessory products; and operates liquor direct sales chain business. The company's Advanced Manufacturing and Professional Services segment provides chemicals and energy materials production; and logistics, and aviation logistic related business services. Its Financial Investments segment invests in private equity and venture capital funds as a limited partner; holds interest in the general partners of various funds; makes angel investments in technology start-ups, as well as minority investments in other entities; and provides office rental services. The company also develops car management software; provides car services information consultant and medical consultation services; and engages in real estate investment and asset management businesses. In addition, it engages in agriculture and food investment; foods trading activities; and offers other animal protein-related products. The company was incorporated in 1984 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

3680.HK.summary: Suoxinda Holdings Limited develops and delivers data and artificial intelligence solutions to the banks and financial institutions in the People's Republic of China and Hong Kong. Its data solutions include software development, data analysis, and system integration and customization services, as well as data integration, storage, cleaning, and processing services. The company also provides Suoxinda precision marketing solution, risk management solution, intelligent label solution, customer voice solution, and supply chain management solution, as well as portrait solution. In addition, it operates marketing management platform, anti-fraud platform, and label management platform; and offers decision engine product, a component embedded in the application program. Further, the company provides consulting services for deep learning, natural language processing, image recognition, data modeling and analysis, data governance, and data visualization technology. Additionally, it sells software and hardware products; offers installation of equipment and software; and provides information technology maintenance and support services. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, the People's Republic of China.

36W.F.summary: Weimob Inc., an investment holding company, provides cloud-based commerce and marketing solutions in the People's Republic of China. It operates through Subscription Solutions, Merchant Solutions, and Digital Media segments. The Subscription Solutions segment provides cloud-hosted commerce and marketing SaaS products; customised software, such as ERP solutions; and other software related services, as well as WeiMall, Smart Retail, Smart Catering, Smart Hotel, Heading ERP, and others for e-commerce, retail, catering, hotel, local life and other industries. The Merchant Solutions segment offers value-added services for merchants to meet merchants' online digital commerce and marketing needs, including assisting merchants to purchase online advertising traffic in various media platforms. The Digital Media segment provides advertisement placement services for merchants. The company was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.

3773.HK.summary: NNK Group Limited provides mobile top-up services to mobile subscribers in the People's Republic of China. The company operates 007ka Top-up Platform for mobile top-up through electronic banking systems. It also provides mobile top-up services through offline channels, including convenience stores; and mobile phone stores and other third party retailer chains, as well as through third-party online platforms, the company's Websites, and Wechat public account. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.
